Title: Abbeygate Cinema

A beautifully modernised yet perfectly original 1920's cinema. Screening everything from timeless classics to the box office latest releases, The Abbeygate Cinema is truly passionate about film. 
The cinema is packed full of comfortable reclining seats and sofas and not only that, you can enjoy a glass of wine, beer or soft drink from the bar whilst watching your film. Abbeygate Cinema's Georgian style licensed restaurant, No.4, is perfect for a coffee and a chat, afternoon tea with home-made cakes, a relaxing glass of wine or a sit-down meal, available day and night. This beautiful new caf�/restaurant has a wonderful function room upstairs available for hire and perfect for private parties, business meetings and other events.
Location: 4 Hatter Street, Bury St Edmunds IP33 1LZ

Title: Abbey Gardens
Body:
The internationally acclaimed Abbey Gardens in the centre of historic Bury St Edmunds attracts thousands of visitors each year, drawn by the superlative floral displays, the ancient setting and the excellent facilities. 
The six-hectare park is on the site of a former Benedictine Abbey, once a power house of medieval England. The combination of floral excellence, formal bedding schemes and the heritage of its backdrop make the gardens a very special place to visit. The site is meticulously maintained and has features of interest to a wide range of visitors including ancient monument ruins, an aviary, a refreshment kiosk, bowling green, tennis courts, water garden, rose garden, sensory garden, a section of the River Lark, a play area, pergola and public toilets. 
Abbey Gardens is much loved by both the local community and the many tourists who visit it throughout the year. It is a stunning venue for the many and varied cultural events which take place in Bury St Edmunds including the annual Bury Festival. The Abbey Gardens received the Green Flag award in 2010, 2011, 2012, 2013 and 2014The Abbey Gardens is owned by St Edmundsbury Borough Council. However, because it covers the major part of the precinct of the medieval abbey of St Edmund, it is under the guardianship of English Heritage as a scheduled ancient monument.
Appleby Rose Garden
Originally an orchard, this is now a beautiful and established rose garden with over 400 rose bushes. The rose garden is named after John Appleby, an American serviceman based at Rougham. A donation of royalties from his book 'Suffolk Summer' saw the rose garden come to life. A bench made from the wing of an American 'Flying Fortress Bomber' and a memorial stone pays tribute to the many US servicemen and women stationed in Suffolk.
Pilgrims herb garden
The garden features many traditional medicinal plants believed to cure most ills and also ward off evil spirits. It was inspired by a now famous manuscript written at the Abbey in the 13th century which is housed in the Bodleian Library in Oxford.

Title: Abbeygate Lighting

The selection of lighting they offer includes all the latest trends from contemporary to traditional lighting and is constantly changing to show the evolving fashions of home interiors.

Title: Abbeygate Wealth Management
Body:

Title: Abbotts Countrywide Estate and Letting Agents
Body: Established since 1850, Abbotts continue to enjoy a highly-respected position in the Norfolk, Suffolk, East Cambridgeshire and Essex property markets. Over the years, they have come to understand some of the stresses and strains that their customers face during the moving process and always aim to provide the very best customer service, making your property sale or purchase as hassle free as possible. They know that their customers need to be sure that by asking Abbotts to sell their home they will be dealing with an estate agent who will do their best to sell their home at the best possible price, which is why they pride themselves on the high calibre agents they employ in each of their branches. All of their employees are experts in the property markets of the East of England, and are extremely knowledgeable about their local areas, be it Cambridge or Chelmsford.  At Abbotts Countrywide, they hope that the range of distinctive services that they have developed goes some way towards assuring you that they will look after you every step of the way, keeping you updated at all times, with regular communication and feedback. When you instruct Abbotts to sell your property, you are not just instructing one local agent, as Abbotts are part of Countrywide plc, the UK's largest estate agency group, with over 1,300 offices throughout the country. Countrywide employ over 7000 estate agents nationwide, and help to facilitate the sales of property worth billions of pounds each year. By listing your property for sale with Abbotts Countrywide, your home will benefit from extensive online advertising through all major property websites, and will be featured on Propertywide.co.uk and Zoopla.co.uk, as well as Rightmove, Find a Property and Primelocation.
Location: 1 Risbygate Street, Bury St Edmunds IP33 3AA

Title: Adecco UK
Body:
If you're committed to achieving professional goals, you need a partner that understands what it takes to succeed in a competitive market. Adecco's reputation as an industry leader coupled with its cross-sector expertise and national network of offices – gives you access to not only the best jobs in today's market, but also the most practical career advice from the most experienced consultants. And as the London 2012 recruitment provider, you couldn't choose a more trusted partner. Working with some of the most exciting companies in the UK, their teams specialise in following four key industry sectors and cater for all job levels within those sectors: Sales and retail, Finance and insurance, Office, admin support and secretarial.

They also have a strong reputation for supplying multi-lingual  candidates; so if you are fluent in more than just your mother tongue, they can find the right opportunity to suit your skill.
Location: 1st Floor, 40 Abbeygate Street, Bury St Edmunds IP33 1LW

Title: Adnams
Body: Established in 1872, Adnams is best-known as a brewer of beer. Whilst beer and pubs remain at the heart of the business, they also own and run hotels, create hand-crafted spirits, import wines and operate nearly a dozen Adnams Stores including the Bury St Edmunds branch.  The shop enjoys a great central location just off ButterMarket. As you'd expect, the shop has an extensive range of beers, wines and spirits, as well as gifts and kitchenware. There's an excellent selection of products to try for free on the tasting bar as well as knowledgeable staff on hand to answer any questions and to help with your every need, from which wine to buy to go with dinner to ordering booze for parties and weddings! Excitingly the shop has opened a newly fitted Gin lab where the fantastic make your own gin experience is held. Gin lovers get a fun and informative gin masterclass while creating and distilling their very own bottle of gin to take home with them!

Body:

Specialised services are also available such as Dermal Fillers, Botox, Semi-Permanent Make-up, Skin Tag Removal and Thread Vein Removal. Combined with highly skilled therapists and an inviting, welcoming environment, you are sure to have a treatment to remember.The clinic has regular special offers and promotions, if these do not appear on their website, please call for details.
The Bury clinic has its own private client car park and is registered with The Care Quality Commission to offer IPL Laser treatment.
Location: 7 St Andrews Street North, Bury St Edmunds IP33 1TZ

Title: Amigos
Body:
Amigos is an authentic Mexican restaurant and bar located in Brentgrovel Street.

The menu includes delicious Mexican specialities including fajitas, enchiladas, quesadillas and burritos.
Location: First floor, 35-36 Brentgovel Street, Bury St Edmunds IP33 1EA

Title: Amma Alterations & Boutique
Body:
Amma Alterations Boutique assist all your needs for any clothing or curtain alterations. Whether it is zip replacements, lengthening or shortening your favourite garments or shortening the length of your curtains, Amma Alterations provide all of these services at competitive prices. So, if you have put on or lost weight and your favourite piece of clothing doesn't quite fit then why not pop into Amma and see if Selina and her team can make the necessary changes so you can extend its life and continue to wear it.

Open Monday through to Saturday, they are specialists in working with leather and are happy to provide quotations for any of their services. They also specialise in alterations to wedding gowns, bridesmaids dresses and prom dresses.

Title: Angel Hill Surgery
Body: Doctors surgery serving the community for all health needs and requirements. Appointments & Enquiries  01284 753008. Prescriptions 01284 755555. Emergencies & Out of hours 01284 753008 / 01284 724744. Health Visitor 01284 757700. District Nurse 01284 718230.
Location: 1 Angel Hill, Bury St Edmunds IP33 1LU

Title: Angel News
Body:
A friendly local newsagent in the heart of the historic part of the town. Angel News also sells tobacco products, confectionery, snacks, cold drink and ice creams. The shop has a range of Bury St Edmunds postcards and sometimes other small souvenirs of the town.

Also worth a visit is its sister shop Lorfords: near arc shopping centre, Lorfords is an old-fashioned tobacconist.
Location: 32 Abbeygate Street, Bury St Edmunds IP33 1LW

Title: Animal
Body:
Born in British waters in 1987, Animal has taken inspiration from its board sports heritage to become a leading lifestyle brand. Combining a passion for adventure and a creative outlook, Animal designs authentic clothes and accessories, creating on-trend collections for those who share a free spirited mindset.

Animal's range has grown over the last thirty years to include freesport and fashion clothing, watches, wetsuits, technical outerwear, eyewear, footwear, luggage and accessories.
Location: 4 Auction Street, Bury St Edmunds IP33 3FA

Title: Arc Shopping Centre
Body:
Arc is an ultra modern retail, leisure and residential development providing some 36 shops, cafe's, restaurants, a magnificent multi-purpose cultural venue and high quality residential apartments in the town centre of Bury St Edmunds in Suffolk.

It is focused around two open shopping streets and a public square, and hosts top brand shops and stores like Debenhams, H&M, Next, TopShop / TopMan, Hobbs, Crew Clothing, HMV, New Look and River Island to name but a few

The Centre is also home to high quality coffee shops and restaurants with Nando's, Carluccios, Costa Coffee and Muffin Break heading up some great places to relax during the shopping experience and right through into the evening.

Arc also provides more than 850 parking spaces and the award winning Apex 500-seat public venue which throughout the year features music, art and other high quality entertainment events. Link this to the 62 apartments above the shops, and you truly have a vibrant 24/7 venue which is a true gem in the heart of the historic Town Centre.
Location: Centre Manager\'s Office, 14 Prospect Row, Bury St Edmunds IP33 3DG

Body: As the largest independent publisher in the Suffolk region, Archant believe that they are the best placed to provide targeted solutions to specific needs. They are community driven and understand the needs of multi-national organisations right down to the requirements of the village shopkeeper. They offer a diverse range of platforms so that any potential advertiser can reap the benefits of a publishing medium which is best suited to them. Why not take a few moments to browse through their newspapers, magazines and websites and if you've got time click on the links to the video, where the benefits of working with Archant Suffolk are clearly defined. They are proud to be the first choice for many local businesses and they are committed to developing your business as much as ours.

Title: Argos
Body: Argos are a unique multi-channel retailer recognised for choice, value and convenience. They sell general merchandise and products for the home from over 700 stores throughout the UK and Republic of Ireland, online and over the telephone. They serve over 130 million customers a year through their stores and take 26% of sales from online sales.  On average, 18 million UK households, or around two thirds of the population, have an Argos catalogue at home at any time.

Title: Armstrongs

Carrying on the independent family tradition is Armstrongs Funeral Service. Noted and awarded for our level of care in providing a truly caring and personal service, Armstrongs are proud to be the only traditional, independent family funeral service in Bury St. Edmunds, Suffolk.

As the only completely independent funeral director in Bury we have the capacity to offer an extremely personal service to our clients.

Our funeral arrangements are totally bespoke in nature, and can be altered to suit a wide variety of individual requests.

Title: Ashtons Legal
Body: Businesses only survive and thrive if they deliver what their clients and customers want. At Ashtons Legal their aim is to be a firm you are proud to call your solicitors and are happy to recommend to others. This means: Making sure they communicate with you promptly, in the way that suits you best. Having lawyers who are approachable and friendly as well as technically and commercially astute Ensuring their costs are transparent and fair and providing practical solutions to your legal needs. Whether you are a commercial client or an individual client, and whatever your legal needs, their focus is on always delivering first class law with exceptional service. With offices in Bury St Edmunds, Cambridge, Felixstowe, Ipswich, Norwich and Thetford they are ideally placed to assist clients throughout East Anglia. In practice, however, they also help people in many other parts of the country whether face-to-face or through their online services. Their aim, in every respect, is to be where clients come first.

Title: Ask Italian
Body: ASK Italian is about a real love for all things Italian. The food and drink come first, of course, with authentic Italian dishes, fresh Italian ingredients and their carefully chosen wines to complement your meal. Then there's the real Italian experienceh, the chatter, the fun, the sharing. And lastly inspired by the design of Milan there's the Italian style that makes eating out feel special whatever the occasion. From their menu holders to their cutlery, their tables to their plate, and even their waiters, everything has that flair, warmth and cuore (heart).

Title: Aubyn Davies
Body:
Aubyn Davies�is a family run independent Menswear and Schoolwear business. Trading since 1907 it offers customers a unique blend of traditional tailoring together with popular heritage brands such as Fred Perry and Barbour who have an exciting selection of shirts, knitwear, scarves and coats in various fabrics from traditional wax to stylish quilts. Mod brand Ben Sherman is still popular and fast growing Weird Fish have exciting collections each season.

Traditional tailoring of suits, jackets, trousers, and coats is met by brands such as Gurteen, Douglas & Grahame and Scot. German trouser firm Meyer is proving very successful with returning customers who are delighted with the quality and fit of its trousers, shorts and jeans.

Upstairs is the Schoolwear Department with knowledgeable staff who are able to offer advice on uniform for 11 local state and private schools.

If you wish to stand out from the high street crowd then pay a visit to Aubyn Davies offering customer car parking and a warm welcome.
Location: 81 St Johns Street, Bury St Edmunds

Title: Auntie Pams Sweet Shop
Body:
Auntie Pams Sweet Shop is a family owned outlet in the heart of Bury St Edmunds town centre. It is a throw-back to an old-fashioned sweet shop selling in excess of one thousand different lines many of which are displayed in large weigh-out jars.
 
A large stock of modern pocket money sweets are available alongside retro lines as well as American sweets, fudge, traditional sweets, penny counter sweets, drinks and milkshakes to name just a few!
 
Auntie Pams offers the opportunity to purchase party bags and jars of sweets of your own choice and to your chosen value. These are ideal for birthdays, Christmas and other special occasions. We now offer personalised labels for your gifts and party bags (minimum one week notice needed).  Auntie Pams can also provide sweets for weddings and wedding favours, just come in and let us know your details.

Title: B&Q
Body: B&Q is the largest home improvement and garden centre retailer in the UK and Europe and the third largest in the world. With more than 40,000 great-value products all under one roof, they strive to offer everything you need to successfully achieve your home improvement and DIY projects. More than three million customers walk through their doors every week

Title: Baileys2
Body: With a strong local reputation for tasty treats, aromatic coffees and sandwiches with a twist, Baileys2 offers a relaxed and friendly environment to lunch, or to break up your shopping trip with a much needed coffee stop! We now also serve a Gluten Free Menu including sandwiches toasties and a tasty range of gluten free cakes. Baileys2 is the proud winner of the 2011 Suffolk Food and Drinks Awards - best Tea / Coffee shop. Thank you to everyone who voted for us. To find out more you can check out our reviews on trip advisor.
Location: 5 Whiting Street, Bury St Edmunds, Suffolk

Title: Balaams Music
Body:
Balaam's Music is an independently owned business supplying printed music and musical instruments of all kinds, from traditional stringed instruments like Violins and Cellos to Flutes, Saxophones, Trumpets and all kinds of brass and woodwind. Stocks include Guitars, Drums, keyboards and Digital Pianos from leading manufacturers like Yamaha  Roland, Casio, Tanglewood and Sonor.
 
Balaam's Music is unusual in that it has a NAMIR repair workshop on the premises, which can take care not only of the initial setting-up of instruments (all-important for inexperienced players!) but they can also take care of work ranging from Services and Overhauls of wind and stringed instruments, to emergency running repairs.
 
Balaam's Music stocks a large range of instrument tutor books from all the leading publishers, as well as examination material from Associated Board (ABRSM) and Trinity Guildhall.
 
A printed list of private teachers of music is available to personal callers at the shop, and an Instrument Rental Programme is run to put good quality instruments into the hands of students of all ages, without a large outlay.

Title: Barclays Bank
Body: With over 300 years of history and expertise in banking, Barclays operates in over 50 countries and employs over 145,000 people. Barclays moves, lends, invests and protects money for customers and clients worldwide.

Title: Barnardos
Body:
As one of the leading children?s charities throughout the UK, Barnardos works with more than 200,000 children, young people and their families every year. The charity provides a much-needed service to children who have been through issues of drug misuse, disability, youth crime, mental health, sexual abuse, domestic violence, poverty and homelessness.
 
As one of nearly 400 stores across the UK, Barnardo?s in Bury St Edmunds accepts donations of a wide variety of unwanted goods - from clothing; to shoes and accessories; to quality homeware; to electrical items; to books, toys, CDs and DVDs; to mobile phones; to foreign currency. These donations raise money towards transforming the lives of vulnerable and disadvantaged children, with services such as counselling, fostering and adoption, vocational training and disability inclusion groups.
Location: 9 St John�s Street, Bury St Edmunds

Title: Bay Tree
Body:
A friendly family-run restaurant offering something for every taste
 
Bay Tree has been established in St John's Street for some 10 years; a lovely street, that retains its traditional feel with many individual shops.  
 
They offer freshley prepared cafe and bistro food Monday to Saturday. They have great coffee, speciality teas & beverages as well as an extensive menu of  breakfast (their chef makes the best scrambled egg), brunch & lunch choices plus they have a yummy home made scones, cakes & pastries, all served in friendly relaxed atmosphere.
 
So, if you need a break from shopping, or want to escape for the much needed lunch break, or just fancy a cuppa & a chat with friends, then come and find us in St John's Street, only a few steps from the the Buttermarket, bus station and car park.
 
Get your taste buds tingling and check out the new Summer menu from Bay Tree. With lots of tasty food, plus options for vegetarians, gluten free diets, low-fat diets and for children. Many of the items are available to takeaway (separate price list available in store).
 
The Bay Tree now offers emergency service personnel, NHS staff & Defence staff discount. Keep an eye on our offers page for their latest promotions.
Location: 11 St John's Street, Bury St Edmunds

Title: Beautiful Beers
Body:
Beautiful Beers, established in 2011 by Rene van der Oort, is dedicated to bringing some of Europe's finest beers to East Anglia. An independent shop and a paradise for a wide range of beer-drinkers, Rene's thorough approach to business has stocked the shelves with an array of award-winning beers.
 
Many have received special recognitions from CAMRA whilst respected critics such as Roger Protz and Jeff Evans have offered praise for many of the beers that Rene has chosen to supply.
 
Immediately apparent upon entering the shop, is Rene's vast knowledge, gained from years of experience within the catering industry, his own interests, and his multi-national past.
The result is a carefully crafted environment, stocking over 200 varieties of beer. The range covers mostly European countries, with a focus on beers from Belgium and The Netherlands.
 
In addition, Rene also stocks a range of beers from local East Anglian micro-breweries.
Situated in the market town of Bury St Edmunds, the shop offers a friendly environment, experienced advice and an exciting, unrivalled range of Beautiful Beers.
Location: 1b St John\'s Street, Bury St Edmunds

Title: Bens
Body: Focusing on sourcing the highest quality ingredients from independent Suffolk suppliers, Ben's is a restaurant that believes it is important to understand where food comes from and the journey it takes from 'Farm to Fork.'  Raising their own Oxford Sandy and Black pigs, and Jacob sheep, Ben's Restaurant ensures it knows where their meat is coming from. Sourcing from free range livestock, their game is also seasonal and shot in Suffolk, and their fruit and veg is organic.
Location: 43-45 Churchgate Street Bury St Edmunds IP33 1RG

Title: Betfred
Body: Betfred has strived hard for decades to be one step ahead of the competition, becoming the first bookmaker to offer 'best price' guaranteed races, the first bookmaker to offer singles on football matches, and the first bookmaker to offer odds of 610/1 for three correct numbers on the Irish Lotto. Offering more bonuses than any other bookmaker and boasting over 830 shops across Britain and an annual turnover in excess of �1.5 billion, Betfred is proud to be the official in-stadium and online gaming partner of Wembley Stadium.

Title: Bills
Body:
Formerly Barclays Bank in Abbeygate, Bill's Restaurant serves meals from dawn to dusk, opening for breakfast and continuing to provide their seasonal menu through to dinner.

With cosy booths were the vaults used to be, you'll find quirky decor using reclaimed materials and furniture. Boasting 130 seats, and a further 40 to 50 on their outdoor decking area called the secret garden, you'll find great tasting food and top notch customer service.

Title: Blacks
Body: Blacks are making the outdoors great. They offer a huge variety of affordable, top quality goods, from men’s, women’s and children's clothing and footwear, including Gore-tex jackets and boots, to camping and hiking equipment, like tents and rucksacks. These great value items come from trusted outdoor brands known for their outstanding technical performance, such as The North Face and Berghaus, and cater for everyone from first time adventurers to outdoor experts.

Title: Bliss Hair Studios
Body:
A family run hairdressing salon situated in a smart vibrant pedestrian area of Bury St Edmunds. The salon is modern, bright and airy and has a very friendly welcoming atmosphere.

Bliss Hair team has many years of experience and offer a very professional service to all, ladies, gents & children.

The Bliss hair team provides a wide range of classic and contemporary hairstyling services together with friendly service from their staff, they will be happy to offer you any advice you might need on your hair.

The double doors make the salon easily accessible for wheelchairs and pushchair

Products they stock include L`Oreal, GHD, Nioxin, Fudge and Goldwell.

Title: bloom hearing specialists
Body:

bloom can help you regain your confidence and start living life to the full again. Our team of experts pride themselves on their customer service and the expertise they can offer you. With a wide range of hearing aid styles and technologies let bloom? help you take control of your hearing. 

What do we offer?
Free Hearing Assessments Your journey to better hearing starts with our Free comprehensive assessment. 

1. Free Home Visits 
At bloom we understand that it?s not always easy to get out and about so if you can?t come to us then we?ll come to you! 

2. Same Day Fit
With bloom there?s no need to wait for better hearing. We stock a wide range of hearing aids that are available to be fitted as soon as you?ve had your hearing tested. 

3. Free Trial
To ensure we have got the right hearing solution for you, our no-obligation trial gives you the opportunity to experience better hearing for yourself over two weeks. 

4. Money back guarantee
We are so confident that you?ll be happy with our hearing solutions and services that we give you a no-quibble, 60-Day Money Back Guarantee. 

5. 4 Year Warranty 
Get four years? peace of mind for your hearing aids at no extra charge! 

6. Free Aftercare For Life
To ensure the lifespan of your hearing aid we provide free aftercare for as long as you have them. We?ll make sure they are working properly with free cleaning, servicing and check-ups, as well as routinely reassessing your hearing and adjusting the hearing aids accordingly. 

Additional Services:
Microsuction ? Wax removal
Advice on Tinnitus
Custom made earplugs for noise protection and swimming

Title: Blue Badge Tours
Body:
The secrets, the stories and the scandals of Bury St Edmunds are yours for the asking. Groups of visitors and residents alike are frequently to be found around the town, indulging themselves with a guided tour.
These happy explorers are led by Registered Guides with a love of history and a sense of humour. As well as the regular tours of the Abbey Ruins and town, the Guides offer speciality tours for pre-booked groups (any number can be catered for). Whether you are a visitor or a resident, let the Registered guides show you the best bits of Bury St Edmunds. 
The Registered Guides of Bury St Edmunds are members of an elite team who have undertaken a long and comprehensive training programme, and have successfully passed the examinations necessary to be accepted into this nationally recognised association. All the guides are registered with the East of England Tourist Board.

Title: BLS English
Body:
BLS English is situated in Bury St Edmunds, Suffolk and has 10 centrally located classrooms.
 
The school is a brilliant place to quickly make friends with an exciting social programme including many free events.
 
BLS English welcomes students from all over the world and from many different backgrounds ? this is what makes the atmosphere special and perfect for learning.  Last year BLS English had over 40 different nationalities study on English language courses.
 
The school works with adults and teenagers over a wide variety of courses from intensive English courses, to summer schools and examination preparation.
 
The school is always looking for hosts in the Bury St Edmunds area. If you are interested in hosting an international student please get in contact with the school.

Title: Body and Mind Studio
Body:
At Body and Mind Studio�, they understand that everyone is unique and special, therefore everyone is individually treated according to their specific requirements including Genetic makeup and Blood Type. They offer a range of personally tailored products and services targeted at all areas of the body and mind to give their clients a total feeling of wellness. These include Personalised Diet and Nutrition Consultancy (GenoType Diet� & Blood Type Diet�), Nutritional & Herbal Supplements, Massage for relaxation, Sports Injuries and Acute/Chronic Pain Relief, Ear Candling and Motivational Speaking.
 
They are UK Distributors for the ANDUMEDIC� 3 range of Andullation Massage Beds (as used by FC Bayern Munich & Real Madrid C.F. Football teams).
 
2015 also saw them become the UK distributors for Athenas Treasures, Argan Treasures and Aloe Treasures Greek Organic skin and Hair Care Products which they import from Rhodes and are available online and in the studio.
 
With over 28 years experience in the Personal Wellness industry, Body and Mind Studio� sincerely hope they can help YOU achieve your personal health and wellness goals! Find out more by heading to their website.

Title: Bohm and Bee
Body:
Bohm & Bee is a Suffolk based clothing label and boutique specialising in handmade capes and ladies fashion. 

The Bohm & Bee Cape has been a huge success since its first 'official" edition back in February 2013. Our Unique Capes are handmade with ever changing combinations all year round. 

Every item is lovingly made with intricate attention to detail and finished with vintage trims and buttons resulting in a high end fashion statement, suitable for all stylish ladies in the city and countryside. The hand stitched button holes look amazing and these were initially on all our classic Bohm & Bee Cape's. We have since introduced a plain version for a subtle look. 

Bohm & Bee was founded over dinner during a cold winter�s eve and has grown into a fun and successful business with friends and family in our team. 

Lucy Bohm, Director & Chief Designer:- Lucy has a background is in sales and marketing. Having successfully conquered many fields including property and recruitment. 

Caroline Appell, Executive Manager and Buyer:- Caroline has a background in retail and keeps the Bohm & Bee boutique running smoothly. 

Bonnie Bohm, Website and Media Executive:- Bonnie is my sister and responsible for all web sales and social media. 

The opening of our first flagship Boutique in Bury St Edmunds, Suffolk has been a huge success not only for our brand Bohm & Bee but also the many other great Scandinavian and British brands with we stock. We really felt there was a gap in Bury St Edmunds for ladies who want to find clothing for day to day wear through to occasions such as Royal Ascot or a friend?s wedding. We feel its important to encourage and support local designers and we stock their designs where possible.
Location: 82 St John�s Street, Bury St Edmunds, IP33 1SQ

Title: Bonhams
Body: Bonhams regional head office located in Bury St Edmunds is situated within the conservation area of the town close to the Athenaeum. The Bury office covers the region from the Suffolk coast to Cambridgeshire and from South Essex to North Norfolk. Their local valuers specialise in pictures, works of art, ceramics, silver, glass, jewellery, furniture, clocks, carpets and rugs and can assist with other areas of interest as well through Bonhams worldwide network of specialists and salerooms. Bonhams' valuers are always happy to meet with you at your nearest regional office, at one of our regular valuation days or alternatively can arrange a home visit.

Title: Bonmarche
Body: Bonmarche offers a variety of affordable quality womenswear in a wide range of sizes (12-24) to women over 45 years, which include casual and formal separates, outerwear, swimwear, lingerie, nightwear and accessories, all designed with the more mature figure in mind, and to suit any budget at all times. Also featured is a collection of affordable, wearable and stylish clothes with real women in mind, designed by David Emanuel in sizes 10-22. The store offers a little extra every time customers shop when they join the Bonmarche Bonusclub. Membership offers exclusive discount mailings, regular bonus day events, exciting in-store promotions, exclusive offers, Spend and Save Promotions and 25% discount on the current BM magazine. The membership and bonusclub cards are free, making them perfect for customers looking to create a fashionable wardrobe at low cost, and available in-store now, just ask any member of staff.

Title: Boots
Body:
The UK's leading pharmacy-led health and beauty retailer, they're here to help you look and feel better. Boots is a member of Alliance Boots, an international pharmacy-led health and beauty group. Their purpose is to help their customers look and feel better than they ever thought possible.

Their customers are at the heart of their business. They're committed to providing exceptional customer and patient care, be the first choice for pharmacy and healthcare, offer innovative products 'only at Boots', with great value their customers love.

Title: Boots Opticians
Body: Whether you need an eye test or want to pick up some new glasses or contact lenses, Boots Opticians is the place to go. With more than 650 Boots Opticians across the UK, you're sure to find one close to you. They pride themselves on their premium level of service and clinical care standards, so when you visit Boots Opticians, you'll know that you're in safe hands.

Title: Bourgee
Body: Bourgee�was founded on the belief that luxury dining can be served at affordable prices. That?s why we offer our customers the very best value for exceptional food, drink and venues�that never cease to delight.
Location: Cupola House, 7 The Traverse, Bury St Edmunds  IP33 1BJ

Title: Bowers Motorcycles
Body:
Bowers are one of the UK's leading Yamaha motorcycle dealers. Whether you're a knee down bike fanatic, tourer, fair weather rider, scooter rider or into Motox, Bowers motorcyles have a fantastic selection of bikes and scooters in store from the Yamaha range. At Bowers Motorcycles they aim not only want to get you a bike or scooter but to get you the right bike or scooter. Furthermore they have an extensive selection of stunning bikes from many other manufacturers and if you cannot see the bike for you let them know and they will try and find it for you.

We also have a huge range of clothing, helmets and accessories including Fox Casual.

Title: Brewshed
Body:
The Brewshed brewery brews its very own Pale Ale, Best Bitter, American Blonde and seasonal beers, which are available at The Beerhouse, The One Bull, The Cadogan and The Crown. 
 
Also available to drink in and around Bury St Edmunds from time to time, at Bury Town Football Club, Thurston Rugby Club and Nowton Cricket Club, be sure to keep your eyes open for Brewshed beer.
 
You can also buy Cocoa beer, brewed in Bury St Edmunds, from Hotel Chocolat online and in selected Hotel Chocolat outlets.
Location: Place Farm, Ingham, Bury St Edmunds

Title: British Heart Foundation
Body:
The British Heart foundation is the biggest funder of heart research and number one heart charity in the UK.

Coronary heart disease is the UK?s single biggest killer, but the British Heart Foundation is leading the fight against it.

The charity was formed in 1961 by a group of medical professionals wanting to fund extra research into the causes, diagnosis, treatment and prevention of heart and circulatory disease.

The Bury St Edmunds shop sells a range of clothing, accessories and other house hold items.

Title: Brown & Co
Body:
Brown & Co aims to be a leading provider of agency, professional and consultancy services across the whole range of rural, commercial and residential property, agriculture and the environment.

From a growing network of offices throughout the East of England and abroad, they combine a high level of specialist technical expertise with experience and local knowledge.

The firm has a real commitment to build strong, proactive and long term relationships with both corporate and private clients, for whom they always strive to deliver the best results and total satisfaction.

Their well trained and enthusiastic staff are encouraged by the partners to play an active part in the firm?s future development and success.

Partnership Profile ? Independent Chartered Surveyors and Business Consultants

Brown & Co is a Limited Liability Partnership with 21 partners assisted by over 160 professionals and support staff working from ten offices throughout East Anglia and the East Midlands, and on an International scale with offices in Poland and St Lucia.
Location: Angel Corner, 8 Angel Hill, Bury St Edmunds

Title: Burger King
Body:
Founded in 1954, Burger King Worldwide is the second largest fast food hamburger chain in the world.
The original home of The Whopper, approximately 100% of Burger King restaurants in the UK are owned and operated by independent franchisees ? many of them family-owned operations that have been in business for decades.
In the UK and Ireland, their belief is simple: they are deeply passionate about the great taste of their flame-grilled burgers, creating the best restaurant experience and innovative food for all their customers. Talented people and a profitable franchise system are at the heart of their growth and success, as is the ability to anticipate and meet the needs of customers and stakeholders.
Location: Arc Shopping Centre, 14 Prospect Row, Bury St Edmunds

Title: Burnett Barker Solicitors
Body:
Burnett Barker Solicitors can help with a wide variety of legal problems, whether affecting you or your business.

Their people are chosen not only for their legal knowledge and skills but also for their attitude and outlook to the problems that you face as an individual or family. Whether moving home, getting divorced, losing a loved one, involved in a dispute or any one of the many other situations that require the help of a solicitor, they can help.

As they are business people, they also understand the pressures and difficulties that from time to time inevitably arise when running your business.

Take a look around their website to find out more about them and their services or get in touch for a friendly and professional service.

Title: Bury Chippy
Body:
Locally sourced fish and chip restaurant with a great reputation. All cod is skinless, bonelss and line-caught fish.

>Gluten free fish is also available to takeaway, with chips and sausages cooked to order at all times.
Location: 64a St Andrews Street South, Bury St Edmunds

Title: Bury Free Press
Body: The Bury Free Press brings you all the latest news, sport, business and entertainment in and around Bury St Edmunds, with editions covering Thetford and Brandon, Lakenheath and Mildenhall and Stowmarket.

Title: Bury St Edmunds Cricket Club
Body: Bury St Edmunds Cricket Club is a leading community cricket club in Suffolk which has been accorded `Clubmark` status by the England and Wales Cricket Board. The club is supervised by a Management Committee consisting of elected members and operated with the support of many active volunteers and a small professional staff. The cricket club aims to have charitable status.  The club plays at the `Victory Ground` which is located close to the town centre of the historic market town of Bury St Edmunds. Facilities include three cricket pitches, one of county standard, practice nets, a clubhouse built in 2013/4 with a large bar, catering facilities and free car parking. Facilities include The Pavilion that can sit up to 100 people with a fully licenced bar and fitted kitchen.
Location: Nowton Road, Bury St Edmunds, Suffolk

Title: Bury St Edmunds Farmers Club
Body:
Founded in 1947, the Bury St Edmunds Farmers Club is an exclusive private members club with traditional service values and high standards of hospitality and catering. 
 
Offering it's members a club restaurant, Regency fine dining, a Grade 1 listed Jacobean lounge, secure car parking and tranquil gardens, the facilities draw members from all walks of life.
 
The elegant surroundings in the heart of Bury St Edmunds can be hired out for corporate functions, parties and weddings, call 01284 750969 for availability.

Title: Bury St Edmunds Library
Body:
Bury St Edmunds Library provides a wide variety of books, DVDs, magazines, maps, referencing and historical information as well as free internet. The library also provides a wide range of activities for children and older people.
 
 
The Library is also home to the Cafe Libra, who offer hot and cold drinks, cake, pastries, sandwiches and tuck.
Location: Sergeants Walk, St Andrews Street North, Bury St Edmunds

Title: Bury St Edmunds Rugby Club
Body:
Bury St Edmunds Rugby Club is a local Rugby Union club that has been playing since 1925.
 
In 1925 Bury and West Suffolk Rugby Football Club took to the field to play their first game. Post war players used to gather and practice at Culford School but by 1963 the Club regularly fielded four teams from its new home in Bury St. Edmunds, at the Haberden with its 3 pitches and small Club house.
 
During the 1970?s the Club rebuilt its playing facilities and raised enough money to build a large new Club house which was further extended in the late 1980?s.
 
In 2006 with the aid of a grant for the R.F.U. the Club added a state-of-the-art All Weather Pitch to its facilities, one of only four in the country.
 
In the mid 1980?s Mini rugby was introduced along with Youth games. Shortly after this the leagues were introduced into Rugby Union.
 
The development of the Youth structure has brought its rewards as in 2001 the 1st Team with many home grown players were promoted to London 3 North East.
 
In 2007, the 1st Team again won the league and were promoted to London Division 2 North. For the first time in its history in 2007 the Colts won a national title taking the National Plate trophy at Franklins Gardens - the Home of Northampton Saints.
 
With youth teams, female teams and a leading 1st team in the region, the club continues to go from strength to strength with history being made each year.
Location: The GK IPA Haberden Southgate Green, Bury St Edmunds,

Title: Bury Town Football Club
Body:
Bury Town Football Club play at Ram Meadow on Cotton Lane in Bury St Edmunds. Founded it 1872, Bury Town is one of the oldest Football Club's in the country. 
One of the 11 founder members of the Suffolk County Football Association in 1885, the club played in various local leagues until 1935 when it became a founder member of the Eastern Counties League. 
In 1968 the club reached the First Round Proper of the FA Cup, and in 1978 moved to their current Ram Meadow ground. The FA re-organisation in 2008 saw Bury moved into the Southern League for a third spell of membership before entering the Premier Division for the first time in the clubs history in 2010-2011.
Location: Ram Meadow, Cotton Lane,  Bury St Edmunds,  Suffolk

Title: Buy the Light
Body:
Buy the Light is the ?smelliest shop in town." They specialise in quality home fragrance products such as Candles, Reed Diffusers, Electric Perfume Diffusers, Fragrance Lamps, Room Sprays and Sachets.

As well as having one of the largest selections of Yankee Candle products in East Anglia, they also sell other leading home fragrance brands from home and abroad.  They also offer a myriad of exclusive products for you and your home.  From contemporary jewellery to fun doorstops, hand painted pillows to decorative ducks, fine hand lotions to leather bags; there is always something different for the discerning visitor.  Perfect for you, but also great for gifting.  A complementary gift wrap service adds the finishing touch to a special gift bought here.

With Customer Service of paramount importance, this Award Winning Gift Shop offers a monthly Discount available on the focus fragrance and a Loyalty Scheme second to none, making a regular visit to Buy the Light a must.

Title: By Choice
Body:
Our Company
Bychoice have established themselves as a well regarded residential sales agency with 5 offices covering the West Suffolk area.
 
Our customer care based ethos and affiliation to the industry?s leading bodies allow our clients to have peace of mind and total protection.
 
Our Strategy
To provide our clients with the highest levels of service, backed by qualified professionals. We hold a solid belief that if the buyer, or tenant is out there we will find them with up to the minute marketing techniques and hard work.
 
Our Goals
To continue going from strength to strength. To work with clients to achieve their property aspirations and to keep true to our beliefs in customer care and professionalism.

Title: Byron Burger
Body:
In London in 2007, it struck owner, Tom Byng, there weren?t any restaurants offering proper hamburgers. So the idea for Byron was born: to do a simple thing well, and do it properly.
 
We source good beef from Scotland. We mince it fresh and cook it medium so it?s pink, juicy and succulent. We place it in a soft, squishy bun with minimum fuss and fanfare. We serve it with a smile in a comfortable environment. And that?s it. We have a few restaurants now but our vision remains the same. To keep serving proper hamburgers the way they should be.
Location: 10 Auction Street, arc Shopping Centre, Bury St Edmunds, Suffolk

Title: C & B Beautiful Ltd
Body:
Owners of C&B Beautiful Ltd, Caroline Grimes & Rebecca Burns, decided to open their beauty salon in Haverhill, Suffolk in September 2003 after working in several other salons in the area.

C&B Beautiful Ltd is continually going from strength to strength & a second salon in Bury St Edmunds opened in November 2010.

They pride themselves on offering a warm, friendly environment with an extensive range of beauty treatments to ensure they have covered all their client's individual needs. All treatments are carried out by fully qualified, experienced Beauty Therapists.
 
Bury St Edmunds currently has three Treatment Rooms, a Spray Tan Room, a Sunbed Room & a large, welcoming Reception.

Title: Cabana
Body: Cabana is East Anglia's first one-stop holiday boutique. With Swimwear in every shape and size (sizes 8-26, cups A-I) plus mouthwatering cotton and silk kaftans, dresses, linens, beach bags, flip flops plus roll-me-and-go hats. Cabana is confident it can make every lady feel fabulous on the beach.  Cabana also stocks a full range of luxury lingerie, nightwear and leisurewear. Go in for a bra fitting today, they are happy to help.

Title: Cafe Kottani
Body:
Cafe Kottani is a family run little Cafe with a wide selection of tasty Greek meals. Our menu includes mousakka, pasticcio, yemista and Greek Meze plates such as tzatziki, hummus, vineleaves, halloumi, feta cheese, olives, giant beans, meatballs, aubergine imam, falafel and more.
 
We also have a range of Greek coffees and Frappes which can be served with our tasty desserts; baklava, kantaifi and kourabiedes.
 
www.facebook.com/CafeKottani
www.twitter.com/CafeKottani
cafekottani.blogspot.co.uk

Title: Cafe Rouge
Body: Cafe Rouge Bury St Edmunds is a warm, family-friendly Parisian-style bistro with a great selection of French inspired food to match. Whether it's a relaxing breakfast, a quick coffee with friends, a leisurely lunch or an intimate meal with loved ones - you're sure to find something irresistible. The varied menu offers an exciting choice of dishes, including lunch favourites such as croques and baguettes, ideal for a quick bite to eat when you are in a rush; through to more indulgent options, such as classic Steak Frites, Moules or Confit de Canard, as well as decadent desserts and an extensive French wine list. The courtyard garden is a wonderful place to while away the afternoon or enjoy patio dining when the sun shines. The restaurant is the perfect setting in which to meet friends or just unwind over a glass of your favourite.

Title: Cafe W
Body: Caf� W is a haven from the high street where you can relax and read a book, meet friends, or catch up on emails using our Free Wi-Fi, all while enjoying top quality food sourced from local producers and great coffee served by our bookseller-baristas.

Title: Caffe Nero
Body:
The Caff_ Nero philosophy is really very simple: premium Italian coffee; a warm and welcoming  atmosphere; good food and great service. The linchpin of their brand is their coffee. They place great emphasis and expend copious amounts of time and energy on supplying a high quality range of espresso based coffee.  
They use a unique blend - exclusive to Caff_ Nero and roasted to their precise specifications ? which creates their signature rich and aromatic flavour.
At Caff_ Nero, great people are the key to great service ? those with genuine warmth and a positive outlook on life are the ones they seek out. They are lucky to have some fantastic people in their company, and they make all the difference.

Title: Cancer Research UK
Body:
The Cancer Research UK charity has been going since 1902. They work at developing newer, kinder treatments and getting closer to cures.
 
A scary 1 in 3 of the population will develop cancer at some point in their lifetime.
 
This charity shop works towards funding the research and stocks a range of clothing, house hold items and books.

Title: Cancer Research UK
Body:
The Cancer Research UK charity has been going since 1902. They work at developing newer, kinder treatments and getting closer to cures.

Title: Card Factory
Body: The Card Factory has been selling greetings cards, gifts, plush items, novelties and gift wrap on the high street for more than 15 years; and, is passionate about offering the highest quality at affordable prices.

Title: Carluccio's
Body: Carluccio?s Italian caff_s, restaurants and food shop brings the best of Italy to Bury St Edmunds. Enjoy all day dining in casual, stylish surrounds. From a quick coffee to a mid-afternoon bite to eat to a special three course dinner, our friendly service and fresh, regional Italian food are sure to please.

Title: Carphone Warehouse
Body: Carphone Warehouse offers contract mobile phone deals, broadband deals and a large range of laptops at excellent prices. Compare mobile phones on any mobile phone network at Carphone Warehouse.

Title: Casa del Mar
Body:
A passion for food & exceptional service are paramount at this small but perfectly formed restaurant.
 
Using only the highest quality fresh ingredients prepared to order, our menu consists of Tapas and Mezze dishes alongside main courses packed full of flavour. For pudding choose from simply the tastiest-ever locally-produced ice cream or homemade desserts.
 
Superb locally roasted coffee and delicious teas are served all day; why not add a piece of homemade cake or a fresh scone? Platters, Panini and Salads with a distinctive Mediterranean twist are also available throughout the day.
 
All this served to you in the fabulous dining area that's inside and out.
 
Whether you are looking for a romantic dinner for two, or a fun filled meal with friends this is a haven for anyone seeking to recreate those relaxed Mediterranean culinary experiences.
 
As the majority of our food is cooked from fresh, on the premises, we are able to respond to most dietary needs ? by default the majority of these dishes are gluten free and suitable for vegetarians.  However, if you do have any specific needs, please do let us know at the time of ordering or, even better, when you make your reservation.
 
The restaurant has recently partnered with Thos Peatlings to offer a fantastic selection of wines too.

Title: Cathedral Dental
Body:
Cathedral Dental is a well established practice in the centre of the historic town of Bury St Edmunds. 

In June 2008 Dr Inderjit Singh (Indy to his patients) bought the business and has quickly brought the practice up to date with the introduction of state of the art treatments such as clear braces, whitening and facial rejuvenation. 

Indy understands the constant technical and economical changes in the dentistry arena, and with that comes the need to dedicate his life not only to his patients and the practice, but also to the industry. 

They are a caring, professional dental practice providing a wide range of quality treatments to suit patient?s individual needs. Using the latest techniques and best materials available, they provide outstanding clinical dentistry. Their dentists are knowledgeable, caring and listen to and understand patient?s needs for their long-term oral health. 

They provide a unique experience for all patients, and are devoted to helping anxious patients overcome their fears and complete their dental treatment. The team are a friendly, caring group and dedicated to the patients desired goals and outcome. 

To learn some cool facts about the practice and how the team always ensure their patients leave with a smile, visit their website here.

Title: Celebrities Nails
Body:
A Professional, reliable and affordable nail salon based in the historic centre of Bury St Edmunds. Offering a friendly service to all customers. 
 
Our salon offers nail extensions either Acrylic or Gel, infills and take offs. Our Salon stands out from the rest by also offering full pedicures and foot treatments.

If that doesn?t excite you we also offer natural nail care, spa pedicure massage treatment, nail art design and facial waxing.

Book an appointment with us or simply walk in.

Title: Celik's Mensroom
Body:
A hairdresser with a difference. Trained in his hometown of Bodrum from age 12. The owner is part of that renowed tradition of Turkish barbers and aims to recreate the experience for modern, cosmopolitan clientele to be found in Bury St Edmunds nowadays.
 
Why not pop in and try the traditional wet shave or simply pamper yourself with a steam face mask and facials.

Title: Chica Shoes
Body:
Carolyn Stennett & Jane Abrey named the shop Chica after the spanish word meaning 'young girl'. They pride themselves on affordable, stylish, quality footwear from Spain and Italy.  
 
Carolyn's daughter Emma has joined the business this winter and has introduced Dubarry Boots & Clothing and R.M Williams to Chica's collections.  
 
Chica Shoes have been trading for over 20 years, they value themselves on a one to one exclusive shoe shopping experience with friendly and helpful service. If you are looking for a wedding shoe with matching handbag or designer labels, they have it all at Chica!

Title: Churchgate Accountants
Body:
Although Churchgate Accountants is a newly formed company, it has a long professional history. The directors Robin Jackson, Roger Baker, Michael MacSwiney and Alwyn Evans have a combined experience in the profession of over 50 years. Their priority is providing the client with tailored, personal advice covering all aspects of accounts, tax and financial planning. This means that clients have peace of mind that Churchgate Accountants can assist them with any queries they may have.

Robin, Roger, Michael and consultant Gary Markham first met when they were all working together at Thornton Baker located at Churchgate House, Churchgate Street in Bury St Edmunds. They have continued to work together since. In 1986, Thornton Baker became known as Grant Thornton and then in 1988 the practice moved to our current premises, 18 Langton Place. It was here that Robin, Roger, Michael and Gary met Alwyn Evans when he joined Grant Thornton.

In March 2011, the Grant Thornton Bury St Edmunds office was transferred to Churchgate Accountants Limited. Churchgate Accountants has a strong, highly qualified team of over 25 people who can advise clients on all areas.  Within the team, there is specialist knowledge of Agriculture and Medical Practices.

Title: Cineworld
Body:
Cineworld is committed to offering its customers a very broad range of films. Cineworld not only shows the Hollywood blockbusters, but has also become the biggest exhibitor of Bollywood films in the UK and has introduced Tamil films alongside a wide mix of independent, art house and foreign films to suit every taste.
 
Cineworld Unlimited Card
Sign up for a Cineworld Unlimited card and experience a whole year of cinema. Pay for your card either monthly or in one lump sum and then come to Cineworld at any time to see as many films as you want. Getting your Unlimited card can be done in minutes online and you can start using it straight away.
 
2-for-1 on Movies
Get 2-for-1 tickets every Tuesday and Wednesday with Meerkat Movies, if you use Compare the Market website and services.
 
Movies for Juniors
Children can also enjoy 'Movies for Juniors' every Saturday at 10 am, with tickets for just �2 on selected kids? movies. Please check the cinema homepage for more details.

The philosophy of Cineworld has always been to provide an excellent level of customer service and an enhanced range of products in a modern, clean, comfortable environment that makes "cinema going" a pleasurable escapist experience.

Title: Claires
Body: Claire's is targeted at different age groups ranging from babies to young adults. You can find earrings, necklaces, bracelets, purses, hair accessories, and fashion accessories. Claire's stores accommodate tastes for all ages, and fashion trends are tailored to appeal to all ages.

Title: Clare Bridal Studio
Body:
At Clare Bridal Studio we have a fabulous collection of designer wedding dresses, shoes, bridal headpieces, and accessories, all carefully chosen to bring our brides the very best in quality styling and bridal design. 

We also have a small, select collection of beautifully made Flowergirl dresses for ages 2 to 9. 

We work closely with some of the most sought-after designers to offer an exclusive range of true designer wedding gowns, from modern and up-to-date styling to boho-chic and glamorous retro. 

Many of our dresses have straps and sleeves, some have a subtle hint of colour, all are made from the finest fabrics and every one of our designer collections has a special personality and style; as unique and individual as the brides who come to see us! 

A price guide for each collection can be found on the relevant pages. 

We are passionate about what we do and work hard to ensure that our experienced and knowledgeable team are able to give every Clare Bridal Studio bride the best customer service, not just on the first appointment, but right through to the wedding day itself. 

Clare Bridal Studio offers a fabulous choice for the discerning bride looking for something truly special! 

An appointment reserves our main fitting room.

As well as being the number one shoe brand in the UK, Clarks are showing continued growth in North America, Western and Eastern Europe, India and China. They are the world's largest casual and smart shoe company and the fourth largest footwear company on the planet. Women's, men's and kids' shoes, boots and sandals. Handbags, umbrellas and small leather goods

They have seasonal times such as Valentine's Day, Mother's Day, Father's Day, Christmas and Easter covered. Clintons in Bury St Edmunds is one of the first stores to be revamped as one of the companies tomorrow stores. Meaning the introduction of a new line of cards and gifts.

Title: Close Brothers LTD

Title: Co-operative Funeral Care

Also offering a range of flowers, from posies to wreaths and sheaves, their range will help to guide you through the different types of tributes you may want to consider.
Pre-paid funeral plans have also becoming increasingly popular, helping you to prepare for your passing, and helping your loved ones in return.

Title: Co-operative Insurance
Body:
Providing car, home, life and health insurance for all families and individuals.

The Co-operative Banking Group is part of The Co-operative Group, the UK's largest consumer co-operative. They are a group of businesses that includes The Co-operative Insurance Society (CIS) and The Co-operative Bank including smile and Britannia.
Location: St. Edmunds House, Lower Baxter Street, Bury St Edmunds

Title: Connells
Body:
Connells customers can expect the best possible price, a transaction to meet their timescale and an efficient, personal service. Their range of specialist property services are designed to make sure they can deliver on these promises.

Since the first Connells branch opened its doors for business in 1936, the company has grown to become one of the largest and most successful estate agency groups in the country. They are part of the Connells Group, a national network of approximately 470 branches throughout the UK.

This coverage, combined with exposure on the top UK property websites (including zoopla.co.uk and rightmove.co.uk) enables them to expose your property to the widest marketplace. Instruct them in one location and your property details can be printed and given to a potential buyer at another, so you won't just attract local buyers.

Title: Constitutional Club
Body:
The Constitutional Club was opened on Friday the 6th April, 1888 by the Marquess of Bristol who was accompaied by Lord Francis Hervey MP for Bury St Edmunds and Lord Harris.

The Grand Opening of the Constitutional Club was reported in the Bury and Norwich Post and the Suffolk Standard in their editions on the 10th April, 1888.

To check that the date you have in mind for your function is available give the Club Manager Gareth Thomas a telephone call on 01284 754113 (Answerphone is connected to this telephone line).
 
Every 1st Wednesday of every month, Bury Guitar Club meets at the Constitutional Club. 
All levels and styles of guitarists and any other instruments are welcome to join the relaxed, informal evening playing and chatting about all things musical! The club runs between 7.30pm and 9.30pm and entry is free. For more information, contact Kevin on 01284 768715

Title: Cooper Lomaz
Body:
East Anglia recruitment consultants delivering cost-effective services for clients and candidates across key market sectors

Cooper Lomaz is a well-established and highly professional recruitment consultancy serving the whole of East Anglia and adjoining areas. The focus is regional ? their reach is national.

The Cooper Lomaz team of over 25 consultants are based in ?centres of excellence? at Norwich, Norfolk and in Bury St Edmunds, Suffolk. All their consultants are carefully chosen and trained in-house to the highest recruitment industry standards.

The services they offer are equally effective for both clients and candidates who are looking to work with responsive recruitment professionals to achieve specific business or career aims.

From the first day of working with Cooper Lomaz, you will recognise right away that every one of their consultants is a true recruitment enthusiast. Whether you?re a candidate or a client, your assigned consultant will be a knowledgeable specialist in your chosen field:

    Accountancy & Finance
    Engineering
    Food Manufacturing
    HR and Personnel
    Information Technology
    Oil, Gas and Renewables
    Sales and Marketing
Location: St Edmunds House, Lower Baxter Street, Bury St Edmunds

Title: Copeland Interiors
Body: Give Copeland Interiors a visit at their shop in Bury St Edmunds and use their expertise in curtains and home interiors, from classic to contemporary. Always be sure of a warm welcome, where they can show you their great range of bespoke products from handmade curtains and blinds to handmade furniture and upholstery. Also see their fabulous range of wallpapers and designer paints all made on the premises alongside their carpets, rugs and giftware. They also offer interior design and project management and home consultations.
Location: 17 St John\'s Street, Bury St Edmunds

Title: Coral
Body:
Coral.co.uk is the only place to go for all your online betting and gaming. They provide a large number of horse racing and football betting markets along with greyhounds and many other sports. They also offer comprehensive bet in play markets and a best odds guarantee on all UK & Irish horse racing.

As well as sports betting you can play online games, including roulette and blackjack. Play their Lotto games, Online Poker and Online Bingo. They even have a live casino with real dealers. So whatever your betting and gaming interest, with over 80 years of gambling experience, Coral is the only place to go.
Location: 1-1a St Andrews Street South, Bury St Edmunds

Title: Coral
Body:
Coral.co.uk is the only place to go for all your online betting and gaming. They provide a large number of horse racing and football betting markets along with greyhounds and many other sports. They also offer comprehensive bet in play markets and a best odds guarantee on all UK & Irish horse racing.
