So whatever your betting and gaming interest, with over 80 years of gambling experience, Coral is the only place to go.

Title: Costa
Body:
Costa's mission has always been to save the world from mediocre coffee. Back in 1971 most people thought this was a noble yet hopelessly unachievable task. But every cup of their Mocha Italia blend created since then has helped them in their quest. Now they're the nation's favourite coffee shop and yet another step closer to a world where bland, average coffee is consigned to history. Want to find out more? How could you resist?

Creating great coffee is an art that takes time and skill to perfect. And with 40 years of experience, they like to think that they've done just that. In that time they've discovered the finest beans, equipment and techniques to make sure that every cup makes the grade.

Now you just have to make a decision -which cup will you go for in-store today?

Title: Cote Brasserie
Body:
Cote serves simple, freshly prepared French food from breakfast through to lunch and dinner, daily.

Inspired by new trends in Paris where locals are tunring away from over complicated expernsive French food, C�te offers a modern approach to classic French dishes, such as steak frites, moules marinieres and corn fed chicken from the heart of rural Brittany.

The award-winning restaurant is dedicated to serving authentic dishes with a modern twist, welcoming the families, dining couples and friends to enjoy good food with good value for money.

The weekday lunch and early evening menu provides outstanding value at �9.95 for two courses and �11.90 for three courses.

Title: Cotswold Outdoor
Body:
Cotswold are a multi award-winning retailers with numerous thriving stores located nationwide.

They offer one of the most comprehensive ranges of outdoor clothing and equipment in the UK with a huge range of footwear, waterproof jackets and fleeces, tents, sleeping bags and outdoor accessories from brands such as Northface, Berghaus, Helly Hansen, Mountain Equipment, Scarpa, Merrell and more.

They are proud of their knowledgeable staff who are actively involved in all sorts of outdoor activities and its for their first hand experience, above anything else, that they selected to work in our store, so don't be shy about asking for their advice - they'll be thrilled to help or even chat about your own trip or challenge. They're really looking forward to welcoming you to their store soon.

As a store they love to get involved with local groups, clubs and societies. They are happy to meet groups to run presentations on the equipment they can provide for your trip as well as hold open evening, especially for individual groups.

Title: Crew Clothing Co
Body: Crew Clothing Co embraces and takes inspiration from all things British. Truly passionate about clothing made from the finest fabrics, with great attention to detail and design that offers an effortlessly relaxed style.

Title: Croasdales Chemists
Body:
Welcome to Croasdales Chemist. They operate from two stores in Bury St Edmunds; their first being at Croasdales Chemist in the town centre of Bury and the second at Mount Farm Surgery on the outskirts of the town, offering easy access from the A14 and free parking. Croasdales Chemist has been established since 1948 and remains the only independent pharmacy in Bury St Edmunds. They have become well recognised as one of the most efficient dispensaries in the area.

As well as medicines, they also sell a range of products that cover Beauty and Lifestyle, vitamins and minerals and mobility. Their team of dedicated and experienced staff are here to ensure the wellbeing of their customers with the high quality service you would expect from your community pharmacy.

Their superintendent pharmacist Nicholas Cooper has worked within the pharmacy for 25 years and has established trusting relationships with patients and their families.

Their pharmacists, dispensers and sales assistants are the public face of the business and they, as a company, encourage development. It is by that way that they will continue to succeed and meet the expectations of their customers.

Title: Cycle King
Body: Cycle King is the country's largest family cycle chain, by always guaranteeing the lowest possible price, coupled with the biggest possible selection of quality cycles and related products, all with the best possible service - both before, and after sale. Their shops specialise in a full range of the country's very best bikes, to suit the youngest child, up to the most discerning adult. New customers are always amazed by the huge selection, to suit all the family, and ALL at prices that are  guaranteed to be the cheapest.

Title: D Roberton & Co
Body: David Roberton & Co. is a leading Bury St Edmunds accountancy firm offering the services of chartered accountants and registered auditors.

Title: Dance and Party Crazy
Body:
Dance and Party Crazy stock dance wear for both men and women.They can also supply one costume or many costumes for parties, or for special occasions like Halloween, Easter, Christmas, Valentines Day or any other celebration. Alongside their fabulous costumes they supply; teeth, blood, wigs, masks and make-up. 
 
They have a website for each of their impressive outlets, so find more information here:
 
http://www.dancewear-burystedmunds.co.uk
 
http://www.fancydress-burystedmunds.co.uk
Location: 77d St John\'s Street, Bury St Edmunds

Title: Dapper Fox
Body: Exciting new luxury menswear brand that offers a range of high quality mens tailoring and casualwear items. Available both in store and online #ifollowthefox.

Title: David's
Body:
David's is a men's hairdresser in the heart of Bury St Edmunds, situated in Langton Place on Hatter Street. 

Whether you're looking for a new style, the latest on-trend haircut or just you're regular trim, David's will have you looking your best ready to hit the streets of Bury St Edmunds.
Location: 6 Langton Place, Hatter Street, Bury St. Edmunds

Title: Debenhams
Body: Department store offering womens, mens and childrens clothes, shoes, furniture and gifts.

Title: Denny Bros
Body:
Denny Bros is a family run independent business that has been operating for over 65 years.

Offering an old fashioned value of good customer service and believing that it is the experience of Denny's that attracts so many customers back to their shop, Denny Bro's has an excellent art shop which is the premier shop for Winsor and Newton and also Dater Rowney products.

The craft and cardmaking shop is always busy with young children and families, offering the tools and materials for all your children's craft needs.

The stationery department covers both retail and commercial services with two Sales Reps on the road delivering their products to the local area.

Downstairs the business offers a printing shop that caters for a lot of the local students, delivering prints and copies, also plan copies, for a range of clients including architects and surveyors.

The department does A0 colour large format prints and offers a laminating service, alongside t-shirt and vinyl printing.

Denny Bro's also has a licence for ordinance survey and can offer wedding stationery to cover that special day.

Moving upstairs the company offers a professional framing department with a large area for several local artists to display their work.
Location: 50 St Andrew\'s Street South, Bury St Edmunds

Title: Drive Vauxhall
Body:
Drive Vauxhall is an award-winning retailer providing an extensive selection of new and used cars and vans. At the end of 2014, the retailer achieved the highest and most impressive combined scores from Vauxhall's Purchase Satisfaction and Service Satisfaction surveys.
 
The Drive Vauxhall centre has a range of services on site including a Body Shop, Servicing Facilities and a Motability Specialist. They also provide a young driver's scheme which helps to lover the cost of motoring.
 
Drive Vauxhall's customer-facing staff are trained in the "Drive Academy" to ensure a consistent high-level of customer service that you will expect from such a company. Priding themselves on exceptional levels of customer care, you will feel safe in the knowledge you're buying your next car at the right place. With free wi-fi, refreshments and either a courtesy vehicle or a courtesy collection/delivery service where applicable, all your needs are catered for.
Location: Cotton Lane,  Bury St Edmunds,  Suffolk,  IP33 1XP

Title: EACH
Body:
The East Anglia?s Children?s Hospices (EACH) works to support families and care for children and young people with life-threatening conditions across East Anglia. 
 
The charity provides care and support in families own homes, in the community or at one of the hospices. 
 
Services include:
Day care 
Overnight breaks in the hospice
Support of children & young people including family. 
Symptom management support and advice
And much more
 
The charity shops work as a key to funding this charity, with clothing, books and other items available.
Location: 75 St John\'s Street, Bury St Edmunds

Title: East
Body:
EAST is a much loved fashion brand. They design clothing for women who love individual, natural fabrics, with an ethnic touch. They are well known and well respected for their heritage, which is steeped in Indian influences and their love for bright colours and vibrant prints. 

Their designers explore the world for the very best materials and as a result they are inspired by the many people they meet and places they visit. They use this inspiration to painstakingly design every detail of every product. This ensures that their products are especially unique and true to their brand. All of their clothing, jewellery and accessories are designed exclusively by them. You won't see them anywhere else - they are genuinely one-of-a-kind.

Title: Eastgate Veterinary Group
Body: Eastgate Veterinary Group is an established local veterinary practise that is proud to provide a professional caring veterinary service. From your first visit to one of their surgeries you will see how highly they value their personal relationships with both pets and owners. They provide life-long care for patients whether healthy or ill, through their team of nurses and vets at all of their clinics.
Location: Cotton Lane, Bury St. Edmunds IP33 1XW

Title: Eaterie at The Angel Hotel
Body: Boasting a number of award-winning chefs in our kitchen, the chic and elegant Eaterie has been awarded 2 AA Rosettes for its superb modern British cuisine.
Location: 3 Angel Hill, Bury St Edmunds IP33 1LT

Title: Ecigwizard
Body:
One of the UK's leading and fastest-growing stockists and suppliers of electronic cigarettes, e-liquids, ecigs mods and accessories. 

Stocking the most popular products available on the electronic cigarette market and as a result they offer variety of products sourced from around the globe.
Location: 46a Abbeygate Street, IP33 1LB, Bury St Edmunds

Title: Edinburgh Woollen Mill
Body: The Edinburgh Woollen Mill sells ladies and menswear for the 45 plus customer. The Edinburgh Woollen Mill is closely involved in every aspect of the development cycle of a natural woollen product - from processing raw material, through production of yarn and cloth to the design and manufacture of the garment, and finally to the sale in the shop. They have built a good reputation for providing the finest quality merchandise at the best possible value.

Title: Edmundo Lounge
Body:
Edmundo Lounge is an informal, neighbourhood food led cafe/bar where families, friends and local residents can come for a coffee and something to eat.

Serving a tasty brunch menu, a selection of proper-job burgers and a great selection of tapas for all food lovers, Edmundo Lounge is a fantastic cafe to be, day and night.

Title: EE
Body:
EE, the UK?s most advanced digital communications company, is the first in Britain to offer superfast 4G mobile services alongside fibre broadband. We run EE, Orange and T-Mobile plans, delivering over 27 million customers the best network and the best service so they trust us with their digital lives. 


In fact, EE has Britain's overall biggest and fastest mobile network. It's so good that readers of Mobile Choice magazine awarded it best network in the UK.

We are building that best mobile network by investing �1.5bn over three years to rollout superfast 4G mobile services covering more than 160 towns and cities. This builds on our �15 billion investment since 2000 building Britain?s biggest 3G mobile network. Our fixed Fibre Broadband service has now reached 15 million households.

Title: Elizabeth Gash
Body: Elizabeth Gash bears the name of its owner and founder, and provides a visual feast of colour, texture and pattern, the urge to forage is almost irresistible. Most of the knitwear is inspired by the beautiful designs of eastern nomadic textiles and rugs, and the range, which can be made to measure, includes; knitted jackets, waistcoats, hats and bags.  Each piece is infused Elizabeth's trademark flair for colour and pattern.
Location: 86 St John\'s Street, Bury St Edmunds

Title: Enterprise
Body:
Founded in 1957, Enterprise Rent-A-Car is an internationally recognized brand with more than 6,000 neighborhood and airport locations in the United States, Canada, the UK, Ireland, Germany, France and Spain.
 
Through tremendous leadership and the entrepreneurial spirit of our employees, Enterprise have built the largest car rental brand in North America, known for exceptionally low rates and outstanding customer service.
 
Today, Enterprise offers a wide variety of car leasing, vanpooling, car sharing and hourly rental programs ? and local car rental customers are picked up at no extra cost.
 
Contact us for more details.
Location: Enterprise Rent-A-Car, Prospect Row, Bury St Edmunds

Title: Ernest Jones
Body: Ernest Jones, the Diamond and Watch Specialist, has over 200 stores and a retail website. Celebrating its 60th Anniversary this year, Ernest Jones offers a wide range of leading brand watches and high quality jewellery. Ernest Jones also has a stunning selection of gifts for all occasions. Ernest Jones is part of Signet Jewellers Limited, the world's largest speciality retail jeweller.

Title: Ernest Webb
Body:
Established in 1952, they are a family-run jewellers who specialise in new and second-hand jewellery. They also welcome watch and jewellery repairs and offer a ring-sizing service and scrap gold purchase. Please telephone or pop in and see them for more details.
 
Ernest Webb has been part of the hustle and bustle of Bury St Edmunds? town centre for 60 years, affectionately dubbed ?Ernies? by locals. They are proud to say that they are now selling wedding rings to the third generation of local families, having first sold their grandparents their wedding rings over 50 years ago.
 
You can expect reliable, personal and expert service when you visit Ernest Webb Jewellers.

Title: Escape Hairdressing
Body: Escape Hairdressing in Bury St Edmunds is a popular and well-loved salon situated on St John's Street.
Location: 71 St. Johns Street, Bury St. Edmunds

Title: Ever Changing Fashion
Body:
Ever Changing Fashion is a Ladies Fashion Boutique and an authorised UK retailer of Kameleon Sterling Silver Jewellery & Jewelpops and Lindsay Phillips Switchflops.
 
We offer the latest ladies fashion accessories including Kameleon interchangeable jewellery and Jewelpops, one of North Americas hottest selling jewellery lines. This fantastic range of Sterling Silver jewellery includes necklaces, rings, bracelets and earrings, all with interchangeable inserts called Jewelpops. There are around 1000 different designs available too! 
 
Our exquisite fashion scarves & hats will help you look fabulous for any special occasion and our fashionable LYDC, Gessy & Gorjus handbags will complete your outfit.
 
Check out our versatile Joanna Vest Scarf with 6 different ways to wear plus our hats for all occasions including weddings, practical and stylish purse organisers which make changing your handbag easy, great value hair accessories, Sterling Silver jewellery from Sparkle Life & Studio 925, the latest designs in affordable costume jewellery from DandX, Eyelevel sunglasses, Britt' s Knits Fashion Boot Socks and also Hawkins weatherproof hats and umbrellas, fashion watches and so much more!
 
Our opening times are Tuesday through to Saturday, 9.30am to 4.30pm.
Location: Ever Changing Fashion... 10 Langton Place, Bury St Edmunds, Suffolk

Title: Fast-Stitch
Body:
Fast Stitch provides a full fitting service and a high speed alteration service on dresses, skirts, jeans, trousers, jackets and coats, including zip replacements.

We also provide an alteration only service for curtains and soft furnishings.
Fast Stitch are specialists in leathers and will be pleased to provide you a quote for repair or alteration.

There is also an EXPRESS service for basic alterations, drop the garment in and pick it up just 1 hour later.

Title: Fat Face
Body: Fat Face offers a wide range of fantastic, quality clothing for men, women and kids, who enjoy those everyday adventures! They also have a great collection of footwear and accessories from jewellery and sunglasses to wallets and bags.

Title: Flex Bar, Lounge & Club
Body:
Flex Night club is open Monday - Saturday, with great drinks deals to get your party started whatever the occasion. 
 
Flex nightclub plays host to award winning Karaoke sessions every Thursday as well as other massive theme and party nights throughout the week!  They have a large smoking and drinking terrace for your convenience. They also have THE FLEX LOUNGE with it's own private bar area, which is available to hire. It's ideal for hen nights or office parties. Call the club for details on how to book this special area for your occasion.
 
Every Monday they host Bury St Edmunds biggest 18+ Student Night #hashtagstudentmondays from 9pm til 2am
 
Tuesday Night Vibe with Baz Jones (vibe fm & denrios resident dj) from 9pm til 2am
 
Midweek Mayhem with Joe Warner (flex resident dj & Karooze thursday night dj)
 
Every Thursday we Kick start the weekend from 8pm til 11pm with our award winning karaoke sessions with clive. then Bury's No1 Cheesest dj Dom C takes overtil 2am with the biggest Thursday Night Party in Town!
 
Every Friday Flex nightclub's very own resident dj Joe Warner Mixes up your Friday Night with some of the biggest and best music videos. Upstairs in the flex lounge Dj Maxwell j hosts urban all your upfront rnb and hiphop tunes around til 3am.
 
Every Saturday THE BIG ONE! 3 DJS , 3 ROOMS UNTIL 3AM Upstairs in the mainroom Stuart Grant (Ex kiss fm & Choice FM) downstairs Dj Sam Asplen with all your commercial chart tunes and party favourites in the lounge Dj Scubii with bring them out with all your upfront r'n'b and hip hop from 9pm til 3am.
 
Every night is free entry into the bar remember to grab the flex vip wristbands from the street team or at reception for free entry and some even better drinks deals at the weekend.
 
Flex Nightclub also has our very own taxi company Foxy Cars so remember if you need a cab into town give us a call on: 01284 767111.
 
FOXY CARS:
Foxy Cars are running from 6.30am every week day. Right the way through tip the early hours of the morning. 
Bury?s friendliest drivers - fully licensed - child & pet friendly - lady drivers.
Low prices.
 
Doctors & hospital appointments to taking your pet to the vets we have it covered. 
Off out for a bite to eat and fancy a bottle of vino or two then give us a call.
Need to catch that train on time then let us get you there on time.
Location: Devonshire House, St Andrews Street, Bury St Edmunds

Title: Focus 12
Body:
We are an independent charity established in 1997. We are a community based residential treatment centre offering 12 weeks primary treatment, leading to a further 12 week secondary treatment if required. We also offer a 28 day programme. Over 1000 adults have been treated since 1997 and our results comfortably place us in the top quartile for performance in abstinence based residential treatment nationally. 

We offer a safe supportive environment to explore and practice recovery with the goal of living in an abstinent lifestyle.

Title: Formal Hire by Gerald Boughton
Body: Formal Hire By Gerald Boughton is the areas only dedicated Mens Formal Wear hire specialist. From the classic to contemporary, a vast range of styles and colour options are available to choose from. Men and boys are both catered for in styles ranging from classic tailcoats, suitable for weddings, or a day at Ascot, through to dinner suits and evening wear, which will see you properly dressed for School Proms, Summer Balls or New Years Eve parties. Complete Highland outfits are also available, as are lightweight Prince Edward suits in grey mohair and chocolate browns. All of these can be accompanied with an unparalleled range of waistcoats and accessories, to buy or hire. Their expanding gift department offers a range of quality keepsakes and presents for those helping out on your special day, or just for the man in your life. No appointment is necessary, so why not pop in and let them help to make your special day one to remember.

Title: Francela
Body: Francela is a Mediterranean Grill and Mezze.
Location: 27 Angel Hill, Bury St Edmunds, Suffolk

Title: Frankie & Benny's
Body: The instantly recognisable red neon sign and warm inviting interior will ease you into the Frankie & Benny?s experience before you can even take your coat off! In typical stateside fashion, great service at Frankie & Benny?s is second to none. Nothing is too much trouble for their obliging and friendly staff. So loosen your tie, relax, settle into your booth seat and relish the wonderful feeling of a very satisfied appetite!

Title: Fred Olsen Travel
Body:
Its been over 20 years that Fred. Olsen Travel Agents have had a shop in Bury St Edmunds! You can find them just opposite Hughes Electrical Store. Fred. Olsen Travel have just recently had a fresh new look inside and out ? so it really is good to know they are catching your eye!
 
Possibly they have been overlooked in the past as many people may think they are a branch of Fred. Olsen Cruises. Fred. Olsen Travel are an independent, family owned travel agency and whilst they are part of the Fred. Olsen Group of Companies, they are always able to offer you the holiday or cruise that is just right for you ? whether it is a Premier Holiday, a Great Rail Journey, a Wendy Wu Tour of China or a tailor-made trip Down Under put together for you by their in store Australasia specialist, Lindsay Cutting.
 
They deal with all the top holiday companies, so are never limited to what they can offer you. When it comes to cruise it goes without saying that they can book Fred. Olsen Cruises for you, but should you want to cruise with P&O, Celebrity, Voyages of Discovery or Silversea ? they can offer you those too and are a top agent for many more cruise companies.
 
Every Fred. Olsen Travel agent takes the time to listen to your needs and then can identify from hundreds of different options what would be the best experience for you, so that they ensure you enjoy and get the most out of your leisure time, not forgetting provide you with great value for your money and excellent service too! They also have the knowledge and ability to tailor your dream holiday anywhere in the world to suit you, plus the industry bonding and accreditation to ensure that you have financial security for your booking and peace of mind should anything not go to plan - they are here in Bury St Edmunds to help you.

Title: Furniture Market
Body: Furniture Market is a second hand store consisting of quality modern home furnishings. The store offers a range of great quality furniture and homeware items.

Title: Game
Body:
Game offers great deals on video games, consoles, accessories and the latest pre-order games.
 
They?re Europe?s leading video games retailer. Their vision is to be their customers? first choice for all of their gaming needs. In their stores, online and in many digital arenas, they help customers learn about, play with, buy and download all their favourite gaming content.

Title: Gascoynes
Body:
Gascoynes is a firmly established accountancy practice located in Bury St. Edmunds that deals with a wide variety of clientele.

Gascoynes was originally established in 1987 by Barry Gascoyne who is still the current principal of the firm. Today Gascoynes is a well respected, high class firm built around a wealth of experience, knowledge, expertise and dedication to the world of accountancy.

At Gascoynes they offer an excellent service to their clients. Their practice sets high standards and aims to meet these for every single client that they act for. To achieve this they have put together a well balanced team of professional qualified staff which, in conjunction with their investment in the latest accounting and taxation software, ensures that these high standards can be met.

They have numerous tools at their disposal to ensure that they are kept up to date with all changes in legislation. This enables them to not only effectively plan your taxation affairs but most importantly plan the best way forward for you and your business.

Gascoynes understands the importance of the client relationship and strives to ensure that not only are all governing bodies kept happy but their clients are as well.

Title: Gastrono-me
Body:
Prepare to be amazed at the giant array of delicious and freshly cooked produce in this little caf�, bakery and deli with shelves lined with daily artisan breads, towering cake displays and deli counters crammed with mouth-watering salads, pastries, cheeses, olives and charcuterie.
 
The menu is like nowhere else in Suffolk and boasts brunch and lunch dishes that will leave your taste buds singing with joy.
 
Come down St John?s Street, call in and feel part of the buzz that is Gastrono-me.
Location: 2 St John\'s Street, Bury St Edmunds

Title: Gavin Ashley
Body:
Situated in the historic core of the town Gavin Ashley Hairdressing is an independent business established since 1978. Awarded a 5-star rating in the Good Salon Guide, the salon offers the highest standard of cutting, colouring and styling for ladies and gentlemen. A team of skilled, professional and friendly stylists offer a wide range of treatments including straightening, perming and hair extension.
 
An in-salon shop stocks luxury hair care brands KMS, Paul Mitchell, Awapuhi Wild Ginger, Fudge, Racoon and GHD. Professional brands used as Goldwell, Kerastright, Nanomax. The salon is open six days a week, offers late night opening and has its own training school. The interior is spacious air conditioned and comfortable with separate areas for cutting, colouring and shampooing. The prices list of services is designed to suit all budgets.

Title: GD Estates
Body:
GD Estates benefits from significant experience of the local property sector, developed over several decades.
 
The renovated Georgian offices are located in the centre of Bury St Edmunds, in a prestigious and award winning street.
 
GD Estates have built a strong reputation for delivering simple yet effective service and are delighted to receive a continued level of new instructions, through recommendations from our existing Landlords and Tenants.
 
As landlords themselves, they truly understand your requirements and offer a unique, yet flexible service. They believe that they work harder to let your property and go that extra mile.
 
GD Estates are able to offer a range of benefits that sets us apart from competition:
 
? Low management fees - coupled with excellent service
? Evening appointments and weekend viewings
? We guarantee to beat any other local agents' fees

Title: Gerald Boughton
Body:
Situated within the historic Corn Exchange building in Bury St Edmunds, Gerald Boughton has spent 40 years building up an enviable reputation for the quality and variety of its menswear offering. 

As an independent business, they pride themselves on their quality of service, as well as the variety which they strive to offer from leading British and European Labels such as Magee, Viyella, Gurteen, Fynch Hatton and Digel, to name but a few.

They understand that everyone is different and that we all have more than one side. With this in mind, you will find that they stock clothing and accessories to fulfil the needs of all occasions. 

From formal dress wear and business suits, to casual and weekend wear, as well as a full made to measure service; they have something to suit everyone. So whether your taste is for the classic or contemporary, you need look no further than Gerald Boughton.

Title: Gibbs Denley
Body:
Our expert insurance brokers can provide bespoke cover to suit your needs, from public liability insurance for businesses to personal car insurance for individuals. High standards of customer service

Continual professional development of our staff

Title: Giggling Squid
Body:
Thai Restaurant in Bury St Edmunds.
 
Giggling Squid brings the simple, rustic , fresh food of Thailand to Bury St Edmunds. From street food to coastal specialities. Eat at Giggling Squid for startling flavours, amazing colours, and original textures.
 
For lunchtime eating, our tasting 'sets' or our Thai tapas . An excellent way to try lots of different dishes in one go.

Title: Giraffe
Body: All-day restaurant, legendary breakfasts, lunch deals and a fantastic dinner menu, wines, cocktails, smoothies and coffee.

Title: Golden City Chinese Restaurant

Title: Goldsmiths
Body: One of the most trusted and respected, leading quality jeweller in the UK, providing a unique customer experience with superior product selection and great people. In addition to their great selection of jewellery and watches, they offer a repair service and valuation service. Please come in and see them for friendly, relaxed service, and a nice cup of tea or coffee - or even a hot chocolate! (You supply the cakes...).

Title: Good Sense Research
Body:
Good Sense Research is a leading consumer market research business. 
 
With over 30 years experience across FMCG - we passionately believe in the power of stimulating conversations with customers. We use a variety of research methods from in-house taste tests and focus groups, to short online-questionnaires and video ethnography and we pay our consumers for all the projects they take part in.
 
Consumers enjoy taking part and we give the clients the insight they need to create successful products!
Location: 10a Brunel Business Court, Eastern Way, Bury St Edmunds

Title: Gourmet Foods
Body: Gourmet Goods brings a discerning selection of gourmet gifts and fine foods to Bury St Edmunds, where you can find our bountiful town centre shop in St Johns Street. Year-round best sellers to seasonal specialities, savoury and sweet, our shop is filled with a range of award winning and artisan gourmet foods, hand crafted spirits, gourmet gifts and hampers.
Location: St Johns Street, Bury St Edmunds IP33 1SP

Title: Greene & Greene
Body:
Greene & Greene is a long established firm of solicitors based in Bury St Edmunds, Suffolk. Their lawyers advise individuals and businesses based all over the UK.
 
The firm has grown every year since the mid 1990s, and they continue to welcome new clients; in the current market they have attracted new clients who had been using firms in London, but now receive a more cost efficient, and more personal, service from them here in Bury St Edmunds.
 
Independent legal directories rate Greene & Greene as one of the best law firms in East Anglia. Those directories base their views solely on feedback from their existing clients, who say that they are ?seldom ruffled by the difficulties of even the most complicated transactions,? that they are ?tremendously helpful? ?sound? and ?professional?. Clients say that they give ?practical and clear advice? and that their ?aftercare is exceptional.? Many of their clients have been with them for decades.

Title: Greene King Visitor Centre
Body: Here you can find out about the history of brewing in and around Bury St Edmunds, courtesy of local firm Greene King, who have been brewing quality cask ales at their Westgate Brewery since 1799. Tour the historic working brewhouse, the brewery, and taste the different beers; visit the shop and take a taste home.
Location: Westgate Brewery, Bury St Edmunds, Suffolk IP33 1QT

Title: Greenwoods
Body: Greenwoods menswear was established in 1860 and continues to enjoy an enviable reputation for unbeatable quality, value and service for menswear and formal hire on the hight street.  For more details about their range of products and services please come and visit them in-store or on-line.
Location: 93 St Johns\'s Street, Bury St Edmunds

Title: Greggs
Body:
Greggs, the home of fresh baking, is the leading bakery retailer in the UK.
 
Expert bakers for the last 70 years, they serve delicious, freshly baked, quality food at great value prices.
 
Greggs can be found on the UK's high streets, local shopping parades, and, increasingly, retail, industrial and business parks, airports, bus/rail interchanges, universities and other locations where people live, work, travel and spend their leisure time. They are a baker and a retailer, with ten regional bakeries supplying their 1,500 shops; a central savoury production unit, making all their savouries; and their own fleet of 375 delivery vehicles, to ensure that food is fresh each day for their customers.
 
They are expert bakers, with 289 Master Bakers, who have 2,254 combined years of baking experience!

Title: Greggs Bakery
Body:

Title: Gross & Co
Body:
Gross & Co has earned an excellent reputation for providing clients with effective and practical legal advice. Their lawyers offer the best available independent legal advice at reasonable cost.

Property Law - Buying a property can be stressful situation for those involved. They act professionally and keep the stresses to an absolute minimum.

Family / Divorce Law - They try and keep you out of Court. Court is a good way of breaking a stalemate, but it is not the answer to every problem. They offer a free initial assessment interview.

Wills Trusts and Probate Law ? Their professional team combines approachability with first rate expertise. The department has over 50 years' combined experience.

Commercial and Employment Law ? Their team offers pragmatic legal advice on matters ranging from mergers, acquisitions and property transactions to partnership agreements and employment disputes.

Immigration Law ? Their team offers comprehensive services to British-based businesses wishing to employ foreign nationals, to foreign businesses and entrepreneurs wishing to set up in the United Kingdom and to private individuals and families wishing to live in the UK.

Title: Guats Up
Body: From the local speciality coffee roaster, Butterworth and Son comes Guat's Up! Serving a range of tea and coffee in the day and selected cocktails, beer and wine at night, the caf�/bar is something a little different in the town.

Title: Guildhall & Barrow Surgery
Body:
They are a NHS General Practice situated in the centre of the historic cathedral town of Bury St. Edmunds, with a branch surgery in the village of Barrow, 7 miles to the west, in the heart of rural West Suffolk.

Title: Guildhall Dental Practice
Body:
Guildhall Dental is a well-established family practice in the Bury St Edmunds? community that has been serving the needs of patients in East Anglia for more than 80 years. 

The purpose-built practice is equipped with the latest technology and has been thoughtfully designed for patient comfort. The highly experienced and dedicated team at Guildhall Dental pride themselves on providing the highest standard of patient care using quality products and proven techniques. 

Guildhall Dental is very much patient-focused and their friendly and welcoming team recognise that each patient is different and understand the needs of nervous patients. With a tailored approach and individual treatment plans patients can be assured of the best possible treatment and care. In addition to routine dental care, Guildhall Dental also offer more complex treatments including oral surgery, dental implants, smile makeovers and Invisalign clear braces.
Location: Guildhall Dental, St Andrews Street South, Bury St Edmunds

Title: Gymophobics
Body:
Gymophobics is a ladies only 30 minute workout gym. It is a gym providing a unique environment for any ladies who would feel intimidated by conventional gyms. 
They specialise in figure shaping and weight loss with their amazing air driven machines. During the workout all body areas are worked on the 10 stations, so members experience higher energy levels, better sleep patterns, improvement in joint mobility and confidence.
The unique 'resisted tension' workout is the only workout in the UK to be patented and designed by Gymophobics founder Donna Hubbard. She has combined resistance exercise with isometrics to make RT, which you can only get at Gymophobics. 100,00 ladies plus are currently using the RT programme nationwide.
 
Gymophobics can now offer Cavitation, Cryolipolysis, vacuum rolling, and skin tightening.
Location: 31 St Johns Street, Bury St Edmunds

Title: H&M
Body:
H&M offers a broad and varied fashion range that allows customers to find their own personal style. The collections are created with H&M?s broad clientele in mind and the aim is to satisfy many different tastes and requirements. H&M is aimed at everyone with an interest in fashion. Customers should always be able to find clothes and accessories at H&M for every occasion. The collections are extensive and new items come into the stores every day.

The women?s collections are intended for fashion-minded women of all ages. The extensive range includes everything from modern basics to tailored classics, sportswear, maternity clothes and cutting-edge fashion. The collections are complemented by matching accessories, underwear and shoes.

The men?s collections include everything from timeless tailored pieces to modern basics, leisurewear and seasonal fashions that reflect the latest trends. Matching accessories, underwear and shoes are also included in the men?s collection.

Title: H.Samuel
Body: H.Samuel is the nation?s favourite High Street Jeweller with over 350 stores and a retail website. Featuring an incredible range of branded watches, they also has a stunning range of jewellery, collectibles and gifts for all occasions, offering something for every taste and style.

Title: haart
Body:
haart is the UK?s largest independent estate agent. Every year, haart helps tens of thousands of people buy, sell, let or rent their home through its network of over 100 branches.

haart is much more though than just a multi award-winning estate agent. It also operates dedicated financial and legal services division together with a national home valuation business, Valunation.

What?s more, haart is committed to providing the very highest levels of customer service and as such is a leading member of both The Property Ombudsman and the Association of Residential Lettings Agents.

haart has now taken this a step further with the launch of a Customer Charter & Guarantee, a series of core values by which everyone at haart operates. With over 20,000 homes worth �3bn available at any one time, haart really are the property professionals.

Title: Hair
Body:
Hair is an independent boutique salon located in the central 'village' quarter of the historic town of Bury St Edmunds.
 
Hair has a specialist team of stylists, skilled in precision cutting techniques and the creation of the perfect hair colour, individual to you.
 
Creativity is a quality of hairdressing the salon is committed to, with client satisfaction being the foundation for their continued success.
 
Relax and enjoy a calm yet confident and friendly atmosphere, safe in the knowledge that not only will you recieve a fantastic cut and colour but also that their stylists will only recommend the correct product for you hair, chosen from their premier range of products.
 
Hair provides a complimentary no obligation Hair Care Consultation and Advice Service, and only use Wella, L'Oreal, GHD, KMS, Macadamia and Australian Bodycare products.

Body:

Halifax is a trading name of Bank of Scotland, itself a subsidiary of Lloyds Banking Group. In the United Kingdom, the Halifax is used as brand for Bank of Scotland branches in England, Wales and Northern Ireland. Halifax is the UK's largest provider of residential mortgages and saving accounts.

Title: Handelsbanken
Body:
Welcome to Handelsbanken, a bank with no product targets or sales campaigns. No branch or executive bonuses. No call centres or computerised decisions. Just local, relationship banking and personal service tailored to your needs.

Handelsbanken believes in playing a significant role in supporting the economic development of the local community by supporting local business and individuals. We deliver traditional banking with a high quality local & personal service, which is tailored to the needs of the local market.

Title: Hardcore Hobbies
Body:
The staff at Hardcore Hobbies are very knowledgeable and always willing to help, selling a wide range of BMX and skate clothing, anything from hats to shoes and t-shirts to watches. They also sell hardware including Skateboards, BMX bikes and Scooters. Safety wear can also be broughtin-store.
 
More recently, the store has decided to trade in music again, stocking a range of music genres in Vinyls and LPs, 7? singles, CDs and the odd cassette as well.

Title: Hardwick Heath
Body: This is a large park of about 55 acres outside Bury St Edmunds town centre. A favourite with our four legged friends and their owners as dogs are allowed off lead. There is also a children?s play area, football pitches, and picnic area. There is also fishing at the pond (you will need a permit to fish).
Location: Hardwick Lane, Bury St Edmunds IP33 2QZ

Title: Harriets Cafe Tearooms
Body:
Remembering the 'old days' is a favourite pastime in which we all indulge. For many, those days are recreated so eloquently at Harriets cafe Tearooms, where the true quality of service from 'yesteryear' is at the centre of everything.

If it's breakfast, lunch or afternoon tea, Harriets has much to offer. All their dishes are made on the premises, many to family recipes, using UK sourced ingredients. Indulge in a fresh cooked breakfast or simply pop in for leaf tea and handmade cakes!

Harriets Cafe Tearooms is fully licensed with outside seating also available in the summer months. Waitresses wear period uniforms and serve you promptly in elegant surroundings. The tearoom has regular live piano music to accompany you, in addition to welcoming children and having good disabled and pushchair access.

Title: Hawkes Car Centre
Body: A used car dealer in Bury St Edmunds stocking a wide range of second hand cars at great prices.

Title: Hayward Moon
Body:
Whether you?re looking to move house, remortgage or acquire a commercial property, our dedicated team can assist you through the legal process.
 
Unlike many other law firms we do nothing but conveyancing and with offices in Ipswich, Bury St Edmunds, Diss, Colchester and Cambridge, our teams would be delighted to discuss any property matters with you.

Title: HMV
Body:
HMV is the UK and Ireland?s leading entertainment brand, enabling comprehensive access to much of today?s popular culture through its chain of stores and online and digital sites as well as through its growing live venue, festivals, ticketing & promoting and artist management operations.
 
Buy new music, CDs, DVDs, games, consoles, Blu Ray, MP3s, iPods, t-shirts, books, gadgets and more.

Title: Hobbs
Body:
The company represents a quintessentially English look with a contemporary twist. Each season?s collection places strong emphasis on design, quality and value. Headed by the Creative Director, the design team takes inspiration from current and past themes and through this process an individual, stylish and timeless collection is produced. Hobbs is unique in the British fashion market, offering a complete wardrobe to the customer where the garments, shoes and accessories form the perfect complement to one another.

Their aim to provide excellent customer service is also the key to their success. Due to this fact, it is not surprising that more than 80% of their customers are repeat buyers.

Title: Holland & Barrett
Body:
Holland and Barrett is the UK's leading retailer of vitamins, minerals and herbal supplements. Their stores are a familiar sight in almost every major city and town across the U.K, with new outlets opening up all the time.
Interest in natural food supplements has increased considerably over the last few years and Holland and Barrett has always had a commitment to its customers to provide high quality products at value for money prices.

Title: Hotel Chocolat
Body:
Hotel Chocolat is a British chocolatier and a unique type of chocolate company that connects luxury chocolate making and retailing with cocoa growing ? it is one of the world?s few chocolate makers to actually grow its own cocoa. Founded in 2004, Hotel Chocolat is a privately owned company with the original co-founders, Angus Thirlwell and Peter Harris, still very much involved. 

1. Cocoa Grower Since 2005, Hotel Chocolat has been growing rare cocoa on its 140-acre cocoa plantation, Rabot Estate, in Saint Lucia. It is the island?s oldest working cocoa plantation, dating back to 1745. 

2. Chocolate Maker Hadley Park, located in Cambridgeshire is Hotel Chocolat?s state-of-the-art chocolate manufacturing facility. In addition, the company operates a warehousing and distribution centre, also in Cambridgeshire. 

3. Omni-Channel Retailer Hotel Chocolat spans the range of retail channels - including online shopping and delivery; a collection of stores in major cities and market towns across Great Britain; European stores in Denmark; franchise stores in Jersey and Guernsey; and concessions in John Lewis and Heal?s stores across the United Kingdom and David Jones in Australia. 

4. Hotelier & Restaurateur In 2011 Hotel Chocolat opened Boucan Hotel & Restaurant ? a 14-room boutique hotel and 54-seater restaurant set on the Rabot Estate cocoa plantation in Saint Lucia. 

5. Chocolate Tasting Club Founded in 1998, The Chocolate Tasting Club sends its members all-new selections of chocolates, which are available every four weeks. Members can score and comment upon the chocolates, which in turn influences future recipes. With an average of 100,000 members it?s no doubt the world?s largest continuous research into chocolate preferences!
Location: 22a Gosnold Street, Arc Shopping Centre, Bury St Edmunds

Title: House of Snow
Body:
House of Snow is a exclusive bridal boutique, located on Hatter Street, Bury St Edmunds. The boutique is super stylish but slightly quirky, offering friendly expert advise and priding themselves on their knowledge for bridal design. 

Owned and run by Harriet Snow, a former designer for international TV and Theatre. House of Snow brings together beautiful fabrics, Harriet's expert eye for fit and precision as well as amazing designers, all together under one roof. 

Featuring gowns by some of the finest designers in the industry, including Jenny Packham, Suzanne Neville, Pronovias, Justin Alexander and Watters Wtoo. House of Snow will provide you with your perfect dress, for your perfect day.
Location: 5a Hatter Street, Bury St Edmunds, Suffolk

Title: HSBC
Body:
They are the world's local bank

With their headquarters in London, HSBC is one of the largest banking and financial services organisations in the world. HSBC's international network has around 7,500 offices in 87 countries and territories across Europe, the Asia-Pacific region, North, Central and South America, the Middle East and Africa.
They have around 100 million customers worldwide

They are listed on the London, Hong Kong, New York, Paris and Bermuda stock exchanges, and shares in HSBC Holdings plc are held by around 221,000 shareholders in 127 countries and territories.

They have a unique international pedigree. Many of their principal companies opened for business over 100 years ago. The founding company from which HSBC took its name, the Hong Kong and Shanghai Banking Corporation, was founded in 1865 to finance trade between China and Europe. In the UK, Midland Bank, which merged with HSBC in 1992, was founded in Birmingham in 1836.

From protecting the environment to investing in communities, HSBC believes in sustainability, managing their business across the world for the long term.

Title: Hughes Electrical
Body:
At Hughes, they know a thing or two about helping their customers; they have been providing expert service and advice for over 90 years!

Rent or buy, they offer a wide range of TV?s, Blu-ray players, washing machines, fridge freezers and more. Rental offers low-cost outlay, no hassle same-day service from trained engineers, no repair bills and the option to upgrade. It gives total peace of mind.

Service is an important aspect; they have 130 qualified engineers at hand in the event of anything going wrong with either your home entertainment or kitchen appliances. They also have aerial and satellite installers to advise on signal issues.

Title: Humphreys Butchers
Body:
Traditional family butchers with fully skilled staff offering locally sourced meat and poultry.
 
Recently acquiring the butchers, Humphreys loves great food and cooking with their priority being sourcing quality suppliers. 
 
Their Bury St Edmunds store is their third, with one in Saffron Walden and another in Braintree.

Title: icandy
Body: ICandy features a huge range of cards and gifts. The store is one of only eight in the country but this business is growing fast.

Title: Iceland
Body: Iceland opened its first store selling loose frozen food in Oswestry in 1970 and has since grown into a unique, fast growing company with more than 730 shops throughout the UK selling a combination of frozen, grocery and chilled food. Iceland are the frozen food experts delivering meal solutions for busy, value conscious shoppers.

Title: Ickworth House
Body:
A Georgian Italianate palace in an idyllic English landscape
 
Ickworth's impressive Rotunda - a magnificent showcase commmissioned by the 4th Earl of Bristol to house his priceless treasures collected on tours around Europe in the 18th-century - is an architectural marvel. For 200 years, the eccentric, and sometimes infamous, Hervey family added to the treasures inside and out, also creating the earliest Italianate garden in England. The exquisite craftmanship of the finest Huguenot silversmiths is breathtaking, and you can follow the family's history through outstanding portraits by Gainsborough, Hogarth and Reynolds.
 
After walking in the tranquil parkland, experience 1930s domestic service in the restored servants' basement, sharing the real stories and memories of former staff who kept this country estate running.
 
Ickworth offers a delicious selection of food throughout the year. Whether you're coming just for a meal, or to make a whole day out our West Wing, Squash Court Cafe and Porter?s Lodge Caf� offer a mouth-watering choice of hot food, snacks and a great cup of coffee. After a busy day enjoying our special place, make sure you find that special gift or memento of your visit. Browse our West Wing Gift Shop and Plant & Garden Shop, for seasonal and inspirational gifts.
 
Don't miss
 
_  Discover the extraordinary life of the 4th Earl of Bristol, the Ickworth visionary who built Ickworth House, a man loved and loathed in equal measure, the vagabond star in his own words.
 
_  Enjoy days out from a great line-up of events throughout the year for all your family and friends.
 
_  Step back in time, open the drawers, and bang out a tune on the piano in our restored basement.
 
_  Enjoy special Living History days, Conservation in Action days and Cooks in the Kitchen days throughout the year in the Rotunda House.
 
_  Discover the enchanting stumpery in the Italianate garden.
 
_  Wander at leisure across 1800 acres of parkland pleasure grounds and chart the changing seasonal landscape.
 
_  Picnic anywhere you like, but our walled garden and seasonal meadow are especially magical during the Spring and Summer.
 
_  Have fun with our children's packs providing hours of entertainment every day of the year, we also run children?s crafts throughout the half terms and summer holidays in the comfort of our West Wing Gallery.

Title: INET3 LTD
Body: Trading for over 23 years, INET3 are a well-established Property Underwriting Agency, providing Property Insurance solutions to Insurance Brokers, IFAs and Affinity Partners nationwide.

Title: Intersport
Body:
Covering a comprehensive range of sports and leisure activities Intersport Bury St Edmunds are the leading independent sports retailer in the area.
They pride themselves on excellent customer service training all staff to a high technical standard so they are able to offer advice to all sports enthusiasts.

Intersport works in conjunction with local schools, sports clubs, health professionals and sports coaches such as hockey, tennis and swimming.

Title: J M Finn & Co
Body:
At JM Finn & Co their clients' interests are paramount.

They recognise that no two individuals are the same. Each client has their own investment requirements and objectives and they aim to provide a bespoke service suited to you, a service which is flexible, objective and unique to you.

At the outset they will ask you to specify an investment policy. Thereafter, all managed portfolios are kept under review which is essential in today's rapidly changing markets.

Ongoing investment in information technology and telecommunications enables them to access a wide range of UK and International research from some of the best sources in the UK and abroad, and allows them to provide the high level of service their clients expect.

Title: Jabu Designs Ltd
Body:
We are a software development company, we specialise in developing strategies for the mobile market, predominantly mobile Application Development. (Apps)
 
We offer a variety of App development solutions, ranging from extremely cost effective Apps designed to showcase your products and services, to more complex and bespoke development such as gaming, CRM and other useful tools.

Our Business App CMS platform is the most comprehensive and powerful tool available in todays App market....with over 45 features available, we can cater for all your business needs...

Our services include comprehensive design and development expertise to ensure the very best consultancy and service.

We pride ourselves on our competative rates, excellent customer service and extensive experience in software development, enabeling fast turnarounds and outstanding results.

Title: Jackson-Stops & Staff
Body:
The Bury St Edmunds office is one of five offices in East Anglia, which ensures a widespread and comprehensive coverage of this unique area. Our clients can deal with partners who have years of experience in the market, a strong local interest and this enables us to offer the degree of commitment, continuity and market expertise that lies at the heart of our service and success in East Anglia.
 
The Team - Local expertise is crucial and the team in the Bury St Edmunds office offers an unrivalled depth of local knowledge. They are able to advise on a broad range of property issues and are anxious to assist. We work in association with Simon Pott & Co a local firm of property consultants and land agents. Simon is a past president of the Royal Institution of Chartered Surveyors and brings a wealth of experience and property knowledge to our team, further strengthening our service in Suffolk.
 
Local Knowledge - Bury St Edmunds is a fine medieval market town located at the centre of East Anglia. The town offers an excellent range of shopping, cultural and leisure facilities including the Arc Shopping centre and is home to the beautiful Abbey gardens which frame the ruins of the 11th Century Benedictine Abbey. The beautifully renovated Regency Theatre Royal is unique in Britain and the town is also famous for its beer brewed here by Greene King since 1799. Our offices are located in a beautiful Grade II listed building in Guildhall Street in the heart of the professional quarter, very close to the town centre.
 
Dedicated Service - The Bury St Edmunds office works in close co-operation with offices in Newmarket, Ipswich, Norwich and Chelmsford to ensure widespread coverage throughout East Anglia. We specialise in the sale of quality town houses and apartments, village houses, cottages, farmhouses and larger country houses, in particular we have an enviable reputation in the field of listed buildings. As well as residential sales we are able to offer a range of professional services provided by chartered surveyors including formal valuations for private and commercial clients. To complement our residential sales department we have a lettings department and offer a full range of residential lettings and management for clients.
 
If you are looking to find your dream home or have property to sell or let and need the best advice we look forward to hearing from you.

Title: Jacobs Allen Chartered Accountants

At Jacobs Allen Chartered Accountants, the professionally qualified team work together to give you quality advice and service that meets your needs and is great value for money ? guaranteed!

Join them now and enjoy?.

Title: Jaeger
Body:
Jaeger is a world-class, contemporary British fashion brand with a rich history and dynamic future built on luxury womenswear, menswear and accessories.
 
Since it was established in 1884, Jaeger has become synonymous with natural fibres such as; merino wool, alpaca, cashmere and camel hair.
 
For 130 years, we have epitomised classic British style with our luxurious fabrics, signature colours ? black ivory and navy ? and exclusive patterns.  Our iconic styles have garnered many a fashionable fan including Marilyn Monroe, Cary Grant and more recently, Dame Judi Dench.
Location: 90 St John\'s Street, Bury St Edmunds

Title: Javelin
Body:

Bury St Edmunds' unique designer store offers both men and women a wide selection of brands, clothing, shoes and accessories, including sought after labels such as Vivienne Westwood, Barbour, Ralph Lauren, Tommy Hilfiger, Paul?s Boutique, Ted Baker, Scotch and Soda, Maison Scotch, Superdry and many more.

Title: JD Sports
Body:

All your sports fashion needs, including footwear, clothing and accessories from adidas Originals, Nike, Mckenzie, Lacoste, Carbrini, K-Swiss and many more!

Title: Jessops
Body:

Striving to provide the highest quality products in quality and performance, Jessops feature products from the top brands in the industry, including Canon, Nikon, Sony, Panasonic, Olympus and more.

Title: Jewellery by Tony Strowger
Body:
Jewellery by Tony Strowger has a well established reputation of being trusted for his work, values, quality and style. Designing and creating bespoke pieces in platinum, gold & silver jewellery for customers. The store's namesake, Tony, holds a strong passion for creating remodelling and repairing all types of jewellery.
A qualified Goldsmith and Jeweller, who has spent many years crafting jewellery in countries, such as South Africa and America, as well as working across the Suffolk region in top end jewellers, Tony promises to bring your dream piece to life. 

All jewellery making and repairs are undertaken on the premises in his own workshop. Specialising in wedding, engagement and eternity rings, Tony can create jewellery to all specifications. 

The store also offers a range of Gold & Silver jewellery, Skagen watches and pearl and bead restringing.
Location: 12 St John\'s Street, Bury St Edmunds

Title: Jigsaw
Body:
At Jigsaw we believe that fashion is temporary but style is permanent. We opened our first store in Hampstead in 1972 to sell stylish clothes in inspiring surroundings, at affordable prices. 

Our designs are timeless, independent-minded and fun. We prefer not to slavishly follow fashion trends;  instead we cherish the opportunity to make something beautiful, meaningful and lasting that you can wear for years. 

We use the best fabrics from the best factories to produce clothes with designer quality and detailing but at high-street prices.  And we do everything we can to make sure that our materials and products are sourced responsibly.

Our store teams are trained to offer our customers friendly, genuine, knowledgeable and impartial advice in a relaxed environment. 

New stock is delivered weekly, allowing the ranges to evolve constantly, so that your shopping experience is always fresh and visually exciting.

Title: John Michael Hair Design
Body: As a professional salon, John Michael Hair Design specialises in the highest quality hair styling services to both men and women. Also offering expertise in creative colouring, the team has Schwarzkopf Master Colour experts at hand to satisfy all aspects of your colouring requirements. The salon stocks some of the industry?s leading hair brands, including Schwarzkopf Professional, KMS and GHD. Open Monday to Saturdays, including late night Thursday?s until 8pm, visit the team at John Michael and treat yourself to a makeover or trim.
Location: 3 St John's Street, Bury St Edmunds

Title: Johnson Cleaners
Body: Across the Johnson Dry Cleaning division, a team in excess of 25 full-time trainers provides a level of guidance unequalled elsewhere in UK Dry Cleaning. This commitment to train and support their staff, combined with in-house technology and expertise, has brought Johnsons to the forefront of the industry and secured their position as the Nation?s No. 1 Cleaner.

Title: JoJo Maman Bebe
Body:
Offer high quality, reasonably priced children?s clothes, maternity clothes and nursery products and toys. Their aim is to offer the customer stunning maternity fashion at very reasonable prices, adorable and practical baby and children?s wear, and all the nursery products and furnishing and toys you may need. JoJo is about value for money and gorgeous design, but they want their collections to be good enough to pass on as 'hand-me-downs!'

In their Bury store they offer an exceptional shopping experience, with customer service being their number one priority. They also offer a free nursing and maternity bra fitting service and have a customer toilet, changing facilities and nursing area in store.

Title: Jones Bootmaker
Body:
Jones Bootmaker specialise in a range of high quality shoes for ladies, men and children. With new styles filling the shelves on a regular basis, this is the perfect place to pick up a new pair of school shoes, seasonal footwear and all the accessories that go with it.
 
Stocking brands such as Barbour, Barker, Camper, Converse, Ecco, Fly London and Geox, to name but a few, Jones offers a full range for the whole family. 
 
Also offering a collection of bags and accessories suitable for all ages and outfits, complete your look with the latest styles around.

Title: Joules
Body:
Joules started nearly three decades ago, when Tom Joule started selling country clothing at equestrian and outdoor events. One typically rainy afternoon, Tom came to the realisation that the clothing available didn?t reflect his customers? personalities. 
 
100 pink wellies we?re bought and ? standing out against a background of green and brown ? sold right away. Forays into design soon followed and harvested unexpected rewards. Classic British clothing was reinvented through the addition of bright colours and an unrivalled attention to detail and in turn a unique and authentic lifestyle brand was created.
Location: 8 Auction Street, Unit 5 The Arc Shopping Centre, Bury St Edmunds

Title: Just Traid
Body:
Just Traid started approximately over seven years ago with the intention that members of all the Churches in Bury St Edmunds and District should work together to assist in alleviating poverty in developing countries by buying and selling Fair Traded goods.
 
Just Traid is a totally self financing organisation and with the generosity of some 170 volunteers a successful shop and caf� has been developed.
 
We use a number of suppliers who must provide us with their fair trade charter before we deal with them. Any profits are given to nominated charities at the close of each financial year.
 
Just Traid are working towards Bury St Edmunds becoming a Fair Trade town.
Location: Just Traid, The Centre, St John\'s Street, Bury St Edmunds

Title: Karooze Cafe Bar
Body:
A town centre venue close to the arc shopping mall. By day, serving food Monday to Saturday, which includes a wide range of freshly filled sandwiches, baguettes & jacket potatoes with soup and light snacks also available. Hot drinks sit alongside their selection of beers, wines, sprits & soft drinks. By night, DJ?s on Friday & Saturday nights bring you the biggest urban party around!! Why not try one of their cocktails or shooters.
Having recently won a Cask Marque, the punch quality of service award why not come and see what all the fuss is about!!
 
Food Times
Light breakfast menu 8.30-10.30
Mon-Thurs 08.30-14.00
Fri-Sat 08.30-14.30
Sun 11.00-14.30
 
Top Up Tuesday & Thursday
Buy a regular coffee or tea bring your cup back and we'll refill it for free. Hot drinks start at just �1 and we know stock Teapigs, including chai latte, Mao feng green tea and winter spice (smells like Christmas in a glass)!

5 o'clock club
25% off select drinks Monday to Sunday - collect your card from the bar

Coffee Collector Card
Buy 7 cups of coffee and get the 8th free!

Children welcome until 6p.m..
nappy changing facilities - disabled toilet facilities - free wi-fi
Location: St Andrews Street South, Bury St Edmunds

Title: KFC
Body: KFC primarily sells chicken pieces, wraps, salads and sandwiches. While its primary focus is fried chicken, KFC also offers a line of grilled and roasted chicken products, side dishes and desserts.

Title: Kings Arms
Body: The Kings Arms is a traditional community pub offering great ale choices, a good wine selection and a wide menu with something suitable however hungry you are. Coffee and food is served all day. Situated on Brentgovel street, just off the market square, it is an ideal stop off after a hard mornings shop- with the spacious patio garden or the comfortable sofa area inside. They have TV screens for the large sporting occasions and live music in the evenings. At the weekends cocktail jugs and shot offers ensure a lively route into town. They cater for for every occasion and have a side door entrance for wheelchair users. They also have a childrens menu, and have special offers for meals after 5pm on certain days. Desserts are also on the menu with traditional desserts as well as those naughty, one off treats! You are always sure of a warm welcome.

Title: Kitchen Kave
Body:
Welcome to Kitchen Kave, Bury's number one inexpensive cookware shop. They sell an extremely large range of everything you could need for your home, and quite a few you didn't know you needed. Included in their kitchenware range are well-known companies such as Kitchen Craft, Apollo, Tala and Stella to name a few. They sell nearly every gadget and utensil including potato ricers, knives by Kitchen Devil and Stella. 

They also have a huge range of washing up bowls, drainers and bins. If you are into baking they cater for your every need with icing sets, large selection of bakeware tins, cake stands and cupcake cases. You may need aprons, oven gloves and tea towels, they have their own exclusive designs and seat cushions and bunting to match.  For the rest of your home they have canvases and lovely scented candles to brighten up your home.  They are specialists in wickenware and have another exclusive range in gardenware

Come in to look and you will be amazed at what you will find.

Title: L Fulchers Funeral Services
Body:
Originally owned by the Fulcher family, they have served families in the local community for generations.

They have a chapel of rest for families to spend time with the deceased, and are happy to open the funeral home out of normal hours if you would like to visit our chapel to spend time with your loved one.

Their comprehensive range of coffins and urns provides a wide choice to suit all requirements. They are carefully displayed to enable you to browse the whole collection and make an informed decision.
 
They have a clear pricing policy and provide written estimates before the funeral, so youkno exactly how much the funeral will cost.  They follow a very strict code of practice to make sure all the families they serve receive the same high standard of service from caring and professional staff.  They are also a member of the National Association of Funeral Directors.

If you would like the funeral of your loved one conducted by a female funeral director, please ask and they will be happy to arrange this for you.
 
L Fulcher has two premises in Bury St Edmunds. They are 80 Whiting Street and St Johns Street.

Title: Lacy Scott and Knight
Body:
Lacy Scott & Knight is a long-established and independent partnership of Chartered Surveyors, valuers, property agents and auctioneers, operating across East Anglia from offices in Bury St Edmunds.
 
As members of a number of professional institutions, including:
The Central Association of Agricultural Valuers (CAAV)
The Royal Institution of Chartered Surveyors (RICS)
The National Association of Estate Agents (NAEA)
The Association of Residential Letting Agents (ARLA). 
We adhere to the highest professional standards while offering an exceptional personalised service.

We remain totally independent, which allows us to focus on our priority of serving the people of Suffolk and the bordering counties.

Title: Lacy Scott Auctioneers
Body:
Lacy Scott & Knight is an independent and long-established firm of auctioneers & valuers and property professionals. We have been selling antiques and works of art since 1869 in our purpose-built Auction Centre situated in the heart of historic Bury St Edmunds since the 1980s and we are one of the largest salerooms in the East of England.
 
We offer a wide range of sales to suit all tastes and pockets including; General Antiques & Collectables (every 2-3 weeks), Fine Art & Antiques (quarterly), Collectors Models (quarterly), Twentieth Century Design (twice yearly) and Fine Wines & Spirits (annually).  We also host specialist auctions of one-off collections where appropriate; recent examples include The Angus McBean photographic collection, militaria, and postcards.
 
Valuers are available at the Auction Centre for free valuations and advice Monday-Friday 9am-5.30pm.  We can also arrange home visits for larger items or collections.
*   email us with images for a quick response valuation and advice
*   Full calendar of well attended sales held on Saturdays
*   Regional, National & International advertising & internet marketing
*   Live Bidding, e-newsletter, extensive catalogue mailing lists
*   Formal valuations for Family Division purposes
*   Formal valuations for Probate & Insurance purposes
*   House Clearance Service

Title: Ladbrokes
Body:
The name Ladbrokes is synonymous with betting and gaming: the hallmark of a premier brand. The company, the origins of which date back to 1886, employs over 14,000 people in Britain and over 16,000 in total. It is one of the world?s leading betting and gaming enterprises. They also operates betting facilities at eight FA Premiership grounds and nine racecourses, including Ascot. In addition to its extensive retail presence Ladbrokes offers thousands of betting markets on a daily basis via the Internet, mobile Internet and telephone. 

The telephone betting operation services 85,000 customers, while Ladbrokes.com, their online betting and gaming facility, has attracted nearly 800,000 active clients. Betting is offered via 13 tailored sites in nine different languages; supporting 17 currencies. The site incorporates the highest levels of security, which underwrite an integrated array of sports betting and gaming services available 24 hours a day, 365 days of the year.
Location: The Market Cross, Cornhill, Bury St Edmunds

Title: Laura Ashley
Body: Laura Ashley, one of the world's best-loved fashion and home furnishings brands, started from humble beginnings. From fashion and accessories for women and children to a range of home furnishings, Laura Ashley helps you add colour and comfort to your life and style. Laura Ashley products are available at many of the stores you shop in everyday.
Location: 1 The Lexicon, Cornhill, Bury St Edmunds

Title: Lawrence Paul
Body:
Lawrence Paul are an independent hair and beauty salon group with two salons in Bury St Edmunds and Norwich. Their Bury St Edmunds and Norwich salons are Sassoon Professional Partner salons. There are only around 50 salons nationwide who are linked to Sassoon and this status allows Lawrence Paul exclusive access to use Sassoon colours and products as well as recommend and sell home care products to their clients. Lawrence has also recently introduced his own brand of home care products which are now available to buy in either salon.
 
Lawrence has over 35 years of hairdressing experience, including working for Vidal Sassoon in London and his highly experienced team regularly attend training courses and seminars hosted by the Sassoon Academy in London.
 
They offer highly professional services in luxury, air-conditioned surroundings and cater for both men and ladies. Both Lawrence Paul salons run a loyalty scheme for regular clients and appointments can be made via their website or by their own App.

Title: Leaders
Body:
Welcome to Leaders in Bury St Edmunds. Based from our brand new branch we aim to assist everybody in the area when it comes to providing great letting agent and estate agent services. 

Bury St Edmunds is an attractive cathedral town, ideally situated between Cambridge and Norwich. A testament to this popularity is that Bury St Edmunds often features as one of the top ten places to live in the UK. 

There is an array of property in the area to suit all budgets and requirements, landlords can expect to receive good rental yields and capital growth on good quality property has remained strong over the last 15 years. Many high profile employers in the area mean there is always demand for property, and we have good quality tenants waiting to move in to the right property. For those looking to sell a property, we can provide valuations and advise on how to present your property to achieve your asking price. 

As one of the top letting agents and estate agents in the area we can assure you that when selling or letting your property with us you will benefit from our expert marketing. We will start by taking great photos of your property, before writing a compelling description ? and after that we can upload your property to all the top property websites such as Rightmove and Zoopla. In addition to our online activity, we advertise in local publications, helping us to gain maximum exposure in the area and encourage potential buyers and tenants to view your property. 

We have a vast amount of property to rent and property for sale. So if you are in need of a letting agent or estate agent you can trust then feel free to stop by the branch or give us a call to discuss your property needs further.
Location: Kings Mews, Kings Road, Bury St Edmunds

Title: Linnet
Body:
Linnet have been based in Bury St Edmunds since 2001, moving to Crescent House on Angel Hill in 2010 and being a local company with local roots, we also support many companies in the region, raising money for local charities. 

Our team offer a range of experience and skills relevant to our key service areas; 

Sales, New Homes, Lettings and Property Management 

We are members of ARLA, the property Ombudsman and preferred agents to Moving Made Easy. 

Covering a 30 mile radius from Bury St Edmunds, we have Suffolk covered and are proud of our links to Suffolk Housing, working with them on Shared Ownership properties within the region, assisting local people to buy local properties and get on the housing ladder.
Location: Crescent House, 28 Angel Hill, Bury St Edmunds

Title: Lloyds
Body:
Lloyds Group plc was renamed Lloyds Banking Group plc on 19 January 2009, following the acquisition of HBOS plc. This makes them the largest retail bank in the UK with strong positions in a number of sectors. One in three people bank with them.

Their goal is to be the best financial services provider in the UK.  They believe this means they must build a leadership position not on the basis of scale but on the foundations of reputation and recommendation.

While the short term outlook for all financial services companies in the UK and around the globe is challenging, they believe that the acquisition of HBOS will be a success and presents them with many opportunities.

The creation of Lloyds Banking Group comes with a big responsibility.

Serving over thirty million people means they have a clear role to play in society; through helping their customers everyday.

Title: Lloyds
Body:
Lloyds Group plc was renamed Lloyds Banking Group plc on 19 January 2009, following the acquisition of HBOS plc. This makes them the largest retail bank in the UK with strong positions in a number of sectors. One in three people bank with them.

Their goal is to be the best financial services provider in the UK.  They believe this means they must build a leadership position not on the basis of scale but on the foundations of reputation and recommendation.

While the short term outlook for all financial services companies in the UK and around the globe is challenging, they believe that the acquisition of HBOS will be a success and presents them with many opportunities.

The creation of Lloyds Banking Group comes with a big responsibility.

Serving over thirty million people means they have a clear role to play in society; through helping their customers everyday.

Title: LOccitane
Body:
L?Occitane beauty products are a true art de vivre devoted to your well-being. They bring together nature and research, following the principles of phytotherapy and aromatherapy. They create formulas that are rich in natural active ingredients and essential oils, which are mostly organic and patented, and always of traceable origin. All their products are dermatologically tested for skin tolerance. 

What started as a company producing only essential oil shampoos, L?Occitane?s line now includes skin care, fragrances, bath and body products, makeup, men?s products, hair care, soaps, and a remarkably extensive home collection.
Location: Unit 12, arc, Auction Street, Bury St Edmunds

Title: Loft & Spires
Body:
Loft & Spires is a unique shop located in the heart of Bury St Edmunds underneath the historic Corn Exchange offering a wealth of fabulous goodies for home living and giving. 

Discover an eclectic mix of exciting, quirky and unusual products for you or your home, and gifts for your family and friends.

Mixing the modern and the traditional, every product is selected with care and they are proud to offer quality and the latest trends at affordable prices. They strive to find those finishing touches that make a house a home and they offer a huge choice of inspiring gifts which are sure to delight.

Title: Lorfords
Body:
